DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A student at Hyakkiyako Alliance Academy, Pina is a strong admirer of chivalry and heroism.

Always cheerful and happy to help out other people, she learned of her yearning of said chivalry entirely through movies. All oddities aside...
She is a straight-forward girl with nothing but the chivalry she yearns for on her path.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A machine gun owned by Pina.

She handles firing the gun as if it were a dance, and claims that her heart is overflowing with enthusiasm.
DataList.FragmentSources:
*Event Shop: 
**[[Ouka ranman]] (50× Shards)
**[[Catch in Neverland]] (50× Shards)
**[[Ouka ranman (Rerun)]] (50× Shards)
**[[Catch in Neverland (Rerun)]] (50× Shards)

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Enrolled at Hyakkiyako Academy, Tsubaki is president of the discipline club.

Notorious as a serial sleepyhead, Tsubaki is always taking naps during the day, so her responsibilities as club president are effectively entirely handled by her friend Mimori.
Contrary to her lazy daytime habits, at night Tsubaki is engaged secretly defending Hyakkihakou Academy.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A submachine gun used by Tsubaki.

It seems that Tsubaki chose a smaller model so that it would not get in the way of her usual daily training.

By the way, Ⅰ is the pillow inside her shield.
DataList.FragmentSources:
*Event Shop: 
**[[Ouka ranman]] (50× Shards)
**[[Ouka ranman (Rerun)]] (50× Shards)
**[[An Unconcealed Heart]] (40× Shards)
**[[An Unconcealed Heart/Rerun]] (40× Shards)

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A member of Trinity Integrated Academy's Vigilante Corps.

Because of Trinity students frequently being targeted by other schools, the Vigilante Corps began patrolling around town to defend against this.
Due to her flaring sense of justice, Suzumi is often misunderstood to have a cold personality. In reality she really is a gentle girl.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Suzumi's assault rifle.

For Suzumi, who often patrols the city streets alone, it's become like a trusted partner in a sense.
DataList.FragmentSources: *Free after tutorial

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Enrolled at Trinity Integrated Academy, Hasumi is the Justice Actualization Committee's No. 2.

In place of its president, Tsurugi, who embodies wildness, Hasumi also acts as the Justice Actualization Committee's tactical commander.
At a glance she appears composed and intellectual, like the archetypal Trinity student. However, Hasumi too is a fully-fledged member of the Justice Actualization Committee, and will sometimes act recklessly while retaining her composed nature.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Hasumi's favorite sniper rifle.

Both the dignified old-fashioned style and the immense power in spite of that seem to reflect those of the rifle's owner.
DataList.FragmentSources: *Free after tutorial

DataList.HobbyEn: Collecting ''Peroro'' goods, collecting cute things, shopping, giving advice
DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A sensitive girl, Hifumi is a student of Trinity Integrated Academy and a member of the Supplementary Classes Club.

Despite her average grades and appearance, Hifumi's gentle and kind personality has gained her popularity.
While she will gladly lend an ear to those with problems, she has a tendency to be swept up in the moment and unintentionally cause trouble.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
The pink assault rifle carried around by Hifumi.

Much like her other favorite goods, it's a must-bring item whenever Hifumi goes out.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
While enrolled as a Student of Trinity Joint Academy, and president of the Justice Actualization Committee, Tsurugi is also Trinity's strategic weapon.

She is of a violent and trigger-happy disposition, and possesses a destroy-first think-later attitude towards whatever she finds disagreeable.
It is due to the efforts of its vice-president, Hasumi, that the Justice Actualization Committee is (just about) kept under control. Despite Tsurugi's uncontrollable and ferocious nature, she can't help but reveal her feminine side when face to face with Sensei and unable to hide her shyness.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
The two shotguns used by Tsurugi.

Named "Blood" and "Gunpowder", they can't be told apart easily even from close range.
DataList.FragmentSources: *[[Joint Firing Drill]] Shop

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A student of Gehenna Academy, Mutsuki is the go-getter of Problem Solver 68.

Contrary to her guilt-ridden childhood friend Aru, Mutsuki is the kind who loves causing crime and trouble without a worry.
No one can read Aru better than Mutsuki, even if she doesn't give any particular thought to the matter.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A machine gun that Mutsuki always carries with her.

According to Mutsuki, firepower is an important component of fun pranks.
DataList.FragmentSources:
*Event Supply Box: 
**[[New Years' Rhapsody No. 68]] (60+ × Shards)

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Section Chief of Problem Solver 68 and student of Gehenna Academy.

Unlike the rest of the group, Kayoko is not one with ill intentions however she's often misunderstood due to her natural facial expression.
Normally keeping silent against these misunderstandings, this likely leads to furthering her scary image.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A handgun that Kayoko usually carries.

As the name implies, it makes a loud roaring noise every time it is fired, so Kayoko had a silencer added to it.
DataList.FragmentSources:
*Event Supply Box: 
**[[New Years' Rhapsody No. 68]] (60× Shards)
**[[New Years' Rhapsody No. 68/Rerun]] (60× Shards)
*Event Shop:
**[[A-H.A Conquest]] (50× Shards)

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Gehenna Academy's self-appointed president of Problem Solver 68, conducts all sorts of illegal business as she pleases.

While Aru considers herself to be a cool outlaw, she often falls out of character and thus any appearance disparities are easily revealed.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Aru's antique-style sniper rifle that she always takes care of.

Just by carrying it, her hard-boiledness increases...or so it seems.
DataList.FragmentSources: *Event Fortune Slips: [[New Years' Rhapsody No. 68]]

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Rank-and-file member of Gehenna Academy's Problem Solver 68.

Due to her gloomy personality, she has always been teased, but was able to escape that fate thanks to Aru. Afterwards she has operated in Problem Solver 68 as a role akin to the youngest child in a family.
Despite her shyness and little self-esteem, it wouldn't be incorrect in saying she's the scariest among the erratic Problem Solver 68.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A shotgun used by Haruka to exterminate pests.

The definition of "pest" seems to be on a case-by-case basis.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A member of the Foreclosure Task Force of Abydos.

She has an emotional and gentle personality, and plays a role as a mental support bringing together the members of the Foreclosure Task Force, which has many extreme personalities.
Though she doesn't say it herself, she is the daughter of a very rich family. In fact, she pays for almost all of the Foreclosure Task Force's snacks from her own allowance.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Machine gun used by Nonomi.

Despite the "Little" moniker, it's actually quite big.
DataList.FragmentSources: *[[New Teacher Guide Mission]]

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A prim yet gluttonous member of Gehenna Academy's Cuisine Research Society.

Differing from her other club members who often overeat everyday food, Junko is one to take part in a certain extent of enjoying reasonable quality cuisine. However she is known to lose her sense of reason when delicious foods are placed in front of her.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Twin assault rifles used by Junko.

Their high rate of fire is proportional to the degree of Junko's hunger, so enemy suppression is faster on an empty stomach.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
The president of the Disciplinary committee of Gehenna that is feared by everyone.

She's a lazy person but she gets serious when it comes to following the school rules.
She's always saying things like "How troublesome" but acts calmly and quickly on the battlefield without hesitation.
Because of how astonishing her power is, organizations hostile to Gehenna are afraid of her on the battlefield.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Hina's machine gun that she utilizes as if it were one of her own limbs.

Those who violate school rules or disturb public morals will be blown away by its merciless destructive power.
DataList.FragmentSources: *[[Night shift guide mission!]]

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Enrolled in Abydos High School, Shiroko is the sports-loving field captain of the Foreclosure Task Force.

Generally a girl of few words and few emotions, she gives off an aloof aura but holds the interest of Abydos above all else.
In order to revitalize the school, she is willing to do anything, and occasionally comes up with ridiculous plans.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Shiroko's cherished assault rifle.

Thanks to careful maintenance, it's always ready to use whenever the need arises.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A student of Abydos High School, and the grouchy secretary of the Abydos Foreclosure Task Force.

One with many complaints, Serika is the type hesitant to show her emotions.
Despite her daily habit of saying "It's fine if this school goes bankrupt", she has a deep love for her school and works tirelessly behind the backs of her clubmates to pay off her school's debt.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
An assault rifle Serika carries to her part-time job.

It is always carefully maintained, thanks to Serika's meticulousness and sincerity.
DataList.FragmentSources:
*Event Shop: 
**[[Business Trip! The Momoyodou Beach House Franchise Plan!]] (50× Shards)
*Pyroxene Shop

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A member of Gehenna Academy's Gourmet Research Society, Izumi is a glutton who will eat anything.

As a result of her overwhelming love of food, she has come to enjoy bizarre foods that other would not touch.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A heavy machine gun used by Izumi.

According to Izumi, the food becomes more delicious in proportion to the number of people disturbing her mealtime that she deals with using this gun.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A young, lazy girl from Abydos High School. She's currently the vice president of the Abydos Student Council, and is also the president of the Foreclosure Task Force.

Speaking like an old man, she enjoys playing around more than work.
Because of this, she's often the subject of anger from the rest of the council, but once the mission starts she protects the other members by fighting valiantly on the front lines.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Hoshino's beloved shotgun, sporting a simple design.

While she may be lazy at heart, Hoshino does not slack off when it comes to maintaining her weapon.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
An agent of Millennium's secret agency "C&C".

With a callsign of Zero-one, Asuna is a veteran who has frequently overcome many difficulties with brute intuition.
On missions, she's very openly trusting of people and breaks any sense of doubt or uncertainty. Her actions are hard to understand but never fail to produce results in the end.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
The assault rifle used by Asuna.

It seems she has forgotten the meaning behind its fun and lively sounding name.
DataList.FragmentSources:
*Event Shop: 
**[[Bunny Chaser Aboard]] (40× Shards)

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Enrolled in the Millennium Science School, Yuuka is the treasurer of the student council known as "Seminar".

A prominent mathematical genius even amongst Millennium's STEM-rich student base, she supervises the management of the school's budget.
Yuuka's speciality is the abacus, and she has a habit of counting on one in order to compose herself when faced with complex and troubling matters.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A pair of submachine guns used by Yuuka.

They help Yuuka make rational and intelligent decisions even under pressure.
DataList.FragmentSources:
*Initial character
*Event Shop: 
**[[Happy Schale ♡ Valentine patrol]] (50× Shards)
**[[Get Set, Go!]] (50× Shards)
**[[Happy Schale ♡ Valentine patrol/Rerun|Happy Schale ♡ Valentine patrol (Rerun)]] (50× Shards)
**[[A-H.A Conquest]] (50× Shards)

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
An agent of Millennium's secret society "C&C".

Having a callsign of Zero-three, she is an essential member of C&C specializing in "cleaning up".
Akane has earned her nickname of "Master Cleaner" for her ability to infiltrate enemy lines with a deceivingly tender impression and gracefully yet explosively "clean out" the enemy.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A pistol that Akane always carries.

 Named such in contrast to the explosives she usually tends to use.
DataList.FragmentSources: *Raid Shop

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Enrolled at Millennium Science School, Eimi is a member of the Supernatural Phenomenon Task Force.

She's a quiet girl who gives a denpa-like impression. It's hard to know what she's thinking. She can often be seen standing around vacantly for no reason.
However, when entrusted with a mission, she is able to execute her objective by moving more efficiently than anyone.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Eimi's treasured shotgun.

As the name suggests, it was created with a variety of situations in mind, from forcefully breaking through to dealing with supernatural phenomena.
DataList.FragmentSources: *[[Joint Firing Drill]] Shop

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
The leader of Millennium's secret agency "C&C".

Looking indisputably like a delinquent with her attire, she's actually prideful of being the strongest agent, boasting a 100% mission success rate.
Because of this, she's earned the callsign "Double O" which is seen as a guarantee of certain victory.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Neru's dual submachine guns.

A beautiful golden dragon pattern is engraved upon both guns.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Student of Millennium Science School, and the scenario writer for the Game Development Club.

As per the title, Momoi works along with her twin sister Midori in game development.

Momoi being the cheerful one with her sister oppositely shy, they don't have much chemistry, but they have unrivalled passion in working together when it comes to games. As of now they've managed to become very close.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
The assault rifle used by Momoi.

Attached to the rifle is an accessory given to Momoi by her beloved younger sister, and she always comes up with new ideas when needed by playing around with it.
DataList.FragmentSources: *[[Shop|Raid Coins store]]

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Student of Millennium Science School, and the illustrator for the Game Development Club.

As per the title, Midori works along with her twin sister Momoi in game development.

Midori being the shy one with her sister oppositely cheerful, they don't have much chemistry, but they have unrivaled passion in working together when it comes to games. As of now they've managed to become very close.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Midori's sniper rifle.

Attached to the rifle is an accessory given to Midori by her beloved older sister, and she always finds inspiration when needed by playing around with it.
DataList.FragmentSources: *[[Shop|Rare Raid Coins store]]

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Student of Millennium and member of the Game development club.

She was found sleeping inside some ruins. Everything about her is unknown, including her age. Currently, she enjoys playing videogames with Momoi, Midori and Yuzu and has become a serious game maniac.

Because she picks up lines from retro games, her speech tends to be hesitant and unnatural.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
The massive railgun that Arisu received from the engineering club.

Its size and power output are so great that ordinary students would struggle to simply walk around with it.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Newly enrolled at Trinity Integrated Academy, Hanae is a lively and cheerful girl who belongs to the Rescue Knights.

She has a positive attitude towards everything and is full of energy, but has a tendency to become overexcited when she finds a patient, usually making the situation worse.
Despite being quite an eccentric character, strangely enough, patients who have received her care have all recovered right away no matter their illness.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
An assault rifle that Hanae brings when examining a patient.

Supposedly, any patient would smile in the presence of this gun (?).
DataList.FragmentSources:
*Raid Shop
*Event Supply Box
**[[The Cathedral's Merry Christmas]] (60× Shards)
**[[The Cathedral's Merry Christmas/Rerun]] (60× Shards)

DataList.HobbyEn: Climbing to high places, keeping an observation diary
DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A student of [[Trinity General School]], and member of the [[Justice Actualization Committee]].

Carrying an unwieldly large rifle, Mashiro speechlessly carries out her responsibilities in providing fire support.

Normally one of few words and rarely interacting with other people, once talks of justice pick up she becomes quite the conversational partner.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A sniper rifle used by Mashiro to carry out her duties in Justice Actualization Committee.

Although size of the rifle makes it unsuitable for carrying around, Mashiro says that such a thing is meaningless in the face of Justice.
DataList.FragmentSources: *[[Tactical Challenge]] shop

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Enrolled at Gehenna Academy, Chinatsu is in charge of first aid at the Public Morals Committee.

Committed to observing the rules and the proper procedures, Chinatsu is one of the few sensible members of the Public Morals Committee, and it falls on her to keep Ako and Iori in check when they get out of control.
Her formal way of speaking tends to give the impression of being cold and distant, "typical of a member of the Public Morals Committee". However, she's really a kind girl who completely softens up when in front of cute animals.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Chinatsu's treasured pistol.

 It seems to mostly be used for pointing at things while commanding others, rather than shooting someone.
DataList.FragmentSources:
*Initial character
*Raid Shop
*Event Shop: 
**[[President Hina's Summer Vacation]] (40× Shards)
**[[Operation record of No. 227 Hot Spring Resort]] (50× Shards)
**[[President Hina's Summer Vacation (Rerun)]] (40× Shards)

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Belonging to Gehenna Academy's School Lunch Club, Fuuka is in charge of managing the school's cafeteria.

Working hard every morning to make a huge number of meals for everyone in the school, her kindness and diligence make her a rarity amongst Gehenna students.
While her meals are certainly good, due to the school cafeteria being understaffed, her true culinary skills tend to go undervalued.
Nevertheless, she puts in effort day by day to provide tastier meals to everyone.
DataList.WeaponNameEn: School Lunch Club self-defense gun type A
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A submachine gun that Fuuka always carries.

Intended for the purpose of controlling the troublemakers in cafeteria, but things usually quiet down before Fuuka gets to use it.
DataList.FragmentSources:
*PVP Shop
*Event Shop: 
**[[Operation record of No. 227 Hot Spring Resort]] (50× Shards)

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A student of Gehenna Academy and member of the School Lunch Club that manages the academy cafeteria.

While working alongside Fuuka to prepare meals for fellow students, because her cooking talent is said to exceed catastrophically bad levels, it's hard to say her food provisions are of particular use.
However because of encouragement and direction from Fuuka, Juri works hard everyday to make better meals.
DataList.WeaponNameEn: School Lunch Club self-defense gun type B
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A shotgun that Juri carries.

Originally issued to control the troublemakers in cafeteria, for some reason Juri often uses it as a cooking tool.
DataList.FragmentSources:
*Event Shop: 
**[[Ivan Kupala|Revolutionary Ivan Kupala]] (40× Shards)
**[[Ivan Kupala (Rerun)]] (40× Shards)

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A member of hacker group Veritas of Millennium.

Among the many geniuses of Millenium, she is one of the most prominent. Most of the advanced cutting-edge devices in Millennium were created by her.
However, despite her ability and achievements, she isn't one to brag. She is kind, friendly with other students and a good listener.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Hare's Assault rifle.

It comes with various cutting-edge features such as the automatic aiming function, but Hare hardly seems to use it.
DataList.FragmentSources:
*Event Shop: 
**[[Business Trip! The Momoyodou Beach House Franchise Plan!]] (50× Shards)

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A hacker from the hacker group Veritas of Millennium Science School.

Her specialty is eavesdropping. She is a strange girl who likes to eavesdrop on people's secret conversations.
She's not good at talking to people, to such a degree that she even uses honorifics with younger first graders.
In real life she's a shy girl of few words, but on the internet she's quite the talker.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A pistol that Kotama always carries.

This model has a minimized firing sound so as not to interfere with wiretapping.
DataList.FragmentSources: *Raid Shop

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Agent of the Millennium Science School secret organization "C&C".

With a call sign of "Zero-Two", she provides powerful fire support from the back line.
Despite her rough appearance, she is actually the most prudent member of the group, and is constantly struggling to hold back the battle-frenzied Asuna and Akane.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
An anti-materiel rifle used exclusively by Karin.

Even from far away in the sky, her shots land with unmatched accuracy.
DataList.FragmentSources: * Card Drawing during Event: [[Bunny Chaser Aboard]]

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A genius inventor from Shanhaijng.

Having already acquired 6 degrees by the time she was in Elementary school, the nicknamed genius is known for bullying and causing trouble for a lot of people.
Saya brings along with her a rat assistant that she's been with since childhood, they're so close that she considers it to be like family.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A custom-made pistol that Saya modified herself.

Apparently, it is also used for giving injections to Nezusuke.
DataList.FragmentSources: *[[Tactical Challenge]] shop

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Shimiko is the librarian of Trinity Integrated Academy's Library Committee.

An absolute bookworm, she is one of the few students who has read the huge book collection in Trinity Library.
She also loves to recommend books to others as much as she loves reading them, such that the first thing that comes to her mind when meeting someone new is "What book would suit this person's taste?"
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A rifle used by Shimiko.

Helps keep the library orderly whenever things get loud.
DataList.FragmentSources:
*Event Shop: 
**[[Summer Sky's Wishlist]] (50× Shards)
**[[Slapstick Sister and Magician of the Old Bookstore]] (50× Shards)
**[[Summer Sky's Wishlist (Rerun)]] (50× Shards)
**[[Slapstick Sister and Magician of the Old Bookstore/Rerun]] (50× Shards)

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A kind girl who is devoted to the Rescue Knights of Trinity.

She has a good-hearted personality and takes part in volunteer work. She becomes overly concerned when it comes to health, because of which she's often told "you're just like my mom" by other students.
Although she hates conflict, she takes a resolute attitude against enemies that threaten the peace.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Serina's assault rifle.

Capable of dispensing more than one kind of shots.
DataList.FragmentSources:
*Event Missions: 
**[[Slapstick Sister and Magician of the Old Bookstore]]
**[[Merry Christmas in the Cathedral]]
**[[Slapstick Sister and Magician of the Old Bookstore/Rerun|Slapstick Sister and Magician of the Old Bookstore (Rerun)]]

DataList.HobbyEn: Looking for tasty sweets, tea parties
DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Enrolled at Trinity Integrated Academy, Airi is a member of the After School Sweets Club.

She has an easygoing personality and treasures spending time talking with her friends while eating sweets more than enything else.
She loves ice cream and has recently developed a taste for mint chocolate.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Airi's submachine gun.

The name comes from that of her favorite sweets at a shop she often visits.
DataList.FragmentSources:
*Event Shop: 
**[[Summer Sky's Wishlist]] (50× Shards)
**[[Slapstick Sister and Magician of the Old Bookstore]] (50× Shards)
**[[Summer Sky's Wishlist (Rerun)]] (50× Shards)
*Event Supply Box:
**[[A Tale of After School Sweets: Sweet Secrets and Gun Fights!]] (60× Shards)

DataList.HobbyEn: All kinds of events, touring cafés for limited edition sweets
DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Yoshimi is a member of the After School Sweets Club of Trinity Integrated Academy.

She has a complex about her height and physique, and always gives the impression of an angry small animal.
Despite wanting to become more adult-like, she is always doted on for how her thoughts are reflected unchanged in her facial expression.
Yoshimi's pastime is touring cafes to taste limited edition sweets - on such occasions alone, she has a brighter smile then anyone else.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Yoshimi's exclusive rifle.

In order to win the battle for sweets in Kivotos, you first need combat ability.
DataList.FragmentSources:
*Event Shop: 
**[[Summer Sky's Wishlist]] (50× Shards)
**[[Summer Sky's Wishlist (Rerun)]] (50× Shards)
*Event Supply Box:
**[[A Tale of After School Sweets: Sweet Secrets and Gun Fights!]] (60+ × Shards)

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Enrolled in Gehenna Academy, Iori is a ruthless specialist of the Public Morals Committee.

As the leader of its assault corps, she punishes students that she finds breaking the rules with overwhelming force.
While she may be quick-thinking, good at her job and possessing a decent sense of combat, Iori is also prone to losing sight of her surroundings once she spots an enemy. This recklessness can lead to her falling into even the simplest of traps.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
The sniper rifle used by Iori when dealing with problems caused by rulebreakers.

Despite being a simple model without even a scope, according to Iori "a specialist doesn't choose their tools".

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Enrolled in Gehenna Academy, Akari is a member of the Gourmet Research Society.

People may think she is just a quiet young girl, but she is actually the long-reigning champion food fighter of the Kivotos Eating Tournament.
While fundamentally a calm and good-natured girl, like a true Gehenna student she is occasionally willing to cause great trouble for others.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Akari's favorite assault rifle.

Her gun can never have quite enough attachments.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Enrolled at Gehenna Academy, Haruna is the club president of the Gourmet Research Society.

Upon first look at her, one might think she is a rich princess-like and aloof elegance, but get her involved in talks of food and all sense of distinction is lost in this zealous gourmet.
In contrast to such gluttony, she is actually not one with much of an appetite. Favorite foods are greasy, full of hormones, and stew-centric.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
The sniper rifle used by Haruna.

By staring down its scope you can see the path leading to the ultimate gourmet, according to Haruna.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Sumire is the leader of the Training Club at Millennium Science School.

One who is typically working on her training, a muscle-brained girl who believes all matters in the world can be solved with muscles and exercise.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Sumire's prized shotgun that she uses while exercising.

The gun has a feature(?) where if you do push-ups every time you fire it, you will naturally become more healthy.
DataList.FragmentSources: *[[Joint Firing Drill]] Shop

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Member of Millennium Science School's hacker group Veritas. A mischievous child who loves graffiti, and creator of Veritas' emblem.

Due to her general optimism and being the type who acts on will, this often leads to her causing trouble with other clubs.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Maki's machine gun that she uses often, even when spraying graffiti.

Having been remodelled utilizing the technology of Millennium, it can load and fire paintballs in addition to live rounds.
DataList.FragmentSources:
*Raid Shop
*Event Shop
**[[Secret Midnight Party ~ Oni Holds a Bell ~]] (40× Shards)

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Hibiki belongs to the Engineering Club of Millennium Science School.

Despite being unsociable and unsophisticated in speech, she exhibits a prominent natural ability in engineering and has invented many marvellous objects.
Her inventions are practically without flaws and while it wouldn't be too much to call them masterpieces, they always include at least one bizarre feature that leaves their users bewildered.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Hibiki's fondly used mortar.

Occasionally finding use in her daily experiments, it is used to fire various other things alongside shells.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
The club leader of the Engineering Club at Millennium Science School.

Without straying from that title, Utaha continues to develop all sorts of various robots. One she always brings along, Rai-chan, is known for having capabilities that can rival several hundred PMC Automata.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A simple submachine gun that Utaha remodeled herself.

It is exceedingly durable and can be used instead of a hammer.
DataList.FragmentSources: *PVP Shop

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Enrolled at Millennium Science School, Kotori is a member of the Engineering Club.

She loves to talk, and will not stop when telling people about physics and the mechanisms of machinery.
Whenever there's machine trouble at Millennium, she'll be the first on the scene to explain the situation.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A machine gun owned by Kotori, also known as "EX-Plain".

Ask her about those names and she will start with a lecture on history of firearm development.
DataList.FragmentSources:
*Event Shop: 
**[[Catch in Neverland]] (50× Shards)
**[[Catch in Neverland (Rerun)]] (50× Shards)

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Chise is a naturally-airheaded girl belonging to the Yin-Yang club of Hyakkiyako.

She joined the Yin-Yang club due to her interest in traditional cultural elements such as haiku.
Exuding a mysterious atmosphere from her appearance and gestures, she is the envy of other Hyakkiyako students. However, she is not aware of this fact herself.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A grenade launcher that Chise usually carries.

Supposedly, a haiku made by Chise is inscribed on each round. Currently on sale at the Yin-Yang club.
DataList.FragmentSources:
*Event Shop: 
**[[Catch in Neverland]] (50× Shards)
**[[Ouka ranman (Rerun)]] (50× Shards)
**[[Catch in Neverland (Rerun)]] (50× Shards)

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Belonging to Shanhaijing Senior High School, Shun is an instructor of the disciplinary support department known as "Meihua Yuan" (Plum Blossom Garden). The club also shares its name with an actual garden.

Shun's kind and tolerant nature has earned her the trust of not only the children of Meihua Yuan, but also other students of Shanhaijing.
Having been an instructor for a long time, she rarely gets angry at the children's mischief, but she is sensitive when one of them brings up her age.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Shun's sniper rifle.

No matter how naughty a child may be, they will immediately start behaving once Shun takes out this gun. Of course, she never actually points the gun at the children.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Ayane is the diligent treasurer of the Foreclosure Task Force of Abydos High School.

The type of girl to put much value on rules and principles, she does her earnest best for the revival of the school.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Ayane's cute little gun.

Unless you repeatedly say or do something unreasonable in front of Ayane, you won't have to face it.
DataList.FragmentSources:
*Event Shop: 
**[[Business Trip! The Momoyodou Beach House Franchise Plan!]] (50× Shards)

DataList.HobbyEn: Studying ninja arts, escorting her lord
DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A member of Ninjutsu Research Club of Hyakkiyako.

Her dream is "to become the greatest Ninja of Kivotos". Because of pursuing a dream not many people can reason with, Izuna is often seen alone despite her bright and cheerful personality.
In her pursuit to become a proper ninja, she continues to refer to Sensei as "Lord" while "escorting" him (simply tailing Sensei around Kivotos) and devoting herself to various other activities.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Izuna's beloved submachine gun.

A state-of-the-art ninja implement, when combined with Izuna-style ninja arts its uses are practically limitless, such as shooting smoke grenades that have been thrown, or massaging her Lord's shoulders.

DataList.HobbyEn: Serving customers with charm, attracting people into her shop
DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A student of Hyakkiyako, Shizuko is the president of the festival management committee and the owner and attraction of the classic-style cafe Momoyo Hall.

Usually the clutz while on the job, she's never one to overdo the attraction role.

In reality, she's the professional-minded kind to do whatever necessary to see the success of her efforts for the festival and Momoyo Hall.

This isn't to say she isn't one to show her true emotions when she lets her guard down; both to her close friends, and to Sensei as well.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A pump-action shotgun used by Shizuko.

Shizuko claims it to be "the only one of its kind that has a faint scent of anmitsu, which is a specialty of Momoyo Hall."
DataList.FragmentSources: *[[Tactical Challenge]] shop

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Cherino is the tyrannical and childlike student council president of Red Winter.

She has an extremely strong desire for power - despite being overthrown in a revolution almost every week, Cherino somehow keeps returning to the seat of student council president.

According to Cherino, her fake moustache is a "symbol of influence" that "radiates authority".
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
The handgun Cherino uses whenever she purges someone.

Without even pulling the trigger, simply pointing the muzzle at someone and shouting "this is a purge!" is sufficient in Red Winter.
DataList.FragmentSources:
*Event Shop: 
**[[Operation record of No. 227 Hot Spring Resort]] (50× Shards)

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Yuzu is the club president of the Game Development Club of Millennium Science School.

She is very bad at speaking to people, and for that reason she almost never goes outside, instead spending the majority of her time inside a locker in the Game Development Club's club room.

 A lover of both playing and making games, her passion for them is no ordinary thing.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
The gun carried by Yuzu.

It has a cute image of an forever-flying cat on the side.
DataList.FragmentSources: *[[Elimination Raid]] Shop

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Nodoka is a student of Red Winter. However, she is currently suspended from school, instead being confined to Class No. 227 in the old school building.

The reason for her suspension is "using a telescope to engage in stalking".
Nodoka has a desire to observe all of the beautiful things in the world with her own eyes (including Sensei). The long hardship she has endured as part of Class No. 227 has given her a deep-running sense of frugality.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A submachine gun that Nodoka carries with her when she goes out for astronomical observations.

Attached flashlight illuminates the dark night road brightly.
DataList.FragmentSources:
*Event Supply Box: 
**[[Ivan Kupala|Revolutionary Ivan Kupala]] (120+ × Shards)
**[[Ivan Kupala (Rerun)]] (120+ × Shards)

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
The ice witch of Trinity's Supplemental Lessons Club.

For various reasons, she had dropped out of school and re-enrolled at Trinity. One to mainly keep to herself, she tends to voluntarily distance herself from others so as to not be a bother. This has led to others in the Supplemental Lessons club worrying for her.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
The gun that Azusa carries.

The text engraved on the gun reads "Everything is futile. No matter how far you go, it's all in vain."
DataList.FragmentSources: *Rare Raid Coins store

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Koharu is a member of the Supplemental Lessons Club of Trinity Integrated Academy.

Originally a member of the Justice Actualization Committee, she was forcefully transferred to the Supplemental Lessons Club due to her falling grades and being made to repeat a year.
While she may consider herself elite, she is actually rather stupid, so much so in fact that she is completely unable to keep up with her lessons.
She has a secret hobby(?) of collecting lewd magazines, and experiences delusions about the most trivial things in everyday life, often to her own embarrassment.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
The sniper rifle used by Koharu.

Koharu was still in the Justice Actualization Committee when it was given its name.
DataList.FragmentSources: *[[Shop|Rare Raid Coins store]]

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Trinity's Supplemental Lessons Club's paragon of sensitivity.

At first glance, Hanako appears graceful and ladylike... Or so one may think. In reality she can be quite the problem child who can't stop speaking of sex.
Her club members, aware of this, are often at a sense of unease every time she speaks.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Hanako's assault rifle.

Even if you ask her where the name came from, she won't tell you.
DataList.FragmentSources:
* [[Raid]] Shop
* Event Milestone Rewards: 
**[[Slapstick Sister and Magician of the Old Bookstore]] (50× Shards)
**[[Slapstick Sister and Magician of the Old Bookstore/Rerun]] (50× Shards)

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
The field captain of Abydos High School's Foreclosure Task Force, who has changed into full riding gear.

Having changed out of her usual school uniform into a cycling jersey, Shiroko somehow has a brighter look on her face than usual. Her goal of riding the entire length of Kivotos is certainly an absurd one, yet Shiroko doesn't appear anxious about it - perhaps due to the presence of a partner she can rely on.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Shiroko's cherished assault rifle.

In order to withstand long-distance travel outdoors, the gun has undergone scrupulous maintenance and has received various modifications.
DataList.FragmentSources: *[[Elimination Raid]] Shop

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
An agent of Millennium Science School's secret society "C&C" who has slipped into a bunny girl costume to order to take part in an infiltration mission.

Asuna is as hyped up as always, despite not wearing her typical maid outfit. If anything, it could even be said that the new experience in an unfamiliar location is affording her even more enjoyment than usual.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
The assault rifle used by Asuna.

Its flashy name is somewhat inappropriate for an undercover mission, but she doesn't care.
DataList.FragmentSources: *[[Elimination Raid]] Shop

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A student of Trinity Integrated Academy, Natsu is the chief troublemaker of the After School Sweets Club and a self-described romanticist.

Natsu has a habit of saying philosophical things out of the blue and using sweets as a metaphor. While her erratic outbursts always leave everyone bamboozled, in reality she simply has the pure intention of wanting to share in the romanticism with everyone. Unfortunately her constantly changing definition of "romanticism" leaves others with the undeniable impression that they're just being messed around with.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A submachine gun that Natsu carries.

For her who prefers the quiet contemplation, wielding this gun is usually a last resort.
DataList.FragmentSources:
*[[Elimination Raid]] Shop
*Event Shop
**[[A Tale of After School Sweets: Sweet Secrets and Gun Fights!]] (50× Shards)
**[[After School Sweets Story: Sweet Secrets and Gun Fights!/Rerun]] (50× Shards)

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
An enthusiastic student belonging to the Public Safety Bureau of Valkyrie Police Academy.

Looking up to the police officers who maintain law and order in the city, Kirino enrolled in the Valkyrie Police Academy, but was placed in the Public Safety Bureau due to her fatally poor shooting skills.
Nevertheless, she doesn't give up on her dream, and strives everyday to become a police officer who can skilfully suppress criminals.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Standard model handgun issued to Kirino by Valkyrie Police Academy.

Even though Kirino blames her questionable shooting skills on this gun, there is nothing particularly wrong with it.
DataList.FragmentSources:
*Event Shop: 
**[[Happy Schale ♡ Valentine patrol]] (50× Shards)

DataList.HobbyEn: Climbing to high places, keeping an observation diary
DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Enrolled at Trinity Integrated Academy, Mashiro is a member of the Justice Actualization Committee assigned to taking along and watching over Tsurugi at the beach.

The shining beach, glittering sand. Anyone would see it as a situation to go playing, Mashiro's mind is focused on training. For this is the justice she believes in.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A sniper rifle used by Mashiro to carry out her duties in Justice Actualization Committee.

Even on the glittering beach, the Justice remains unchanged.

DataList.HobbyEn: Collecting ''Peroro'' goods, collecting cute things, shopping, giving advice
DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A sensitive girl of Trinity Integrated Academy's Remedial Lessons Club who visited the seaside with her friends.

For the sake of Azusa who had never been to the seaside before, she committed the outrageous act of quietly stealing (or according to Hifumi, borrowing) Trinity's Crusader tank. However as one would expect, this was discovered by the Justice Actualization Committee, causing her to get caught up in a big affair. Despite riding a tank, Hifumi's clumsy nature doesn't change, such that for all the power a tank possesses, she ends up stirring up a commotion to suit.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
The pink rifle carried around by Hifumi.

Firearm with a cute design is a must-have item for any beach vacation.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A genius inventor of Shanhaijing Senior High School who is thoroughly enjoying her long-awaited day off after breaking free from her hectic everyday routine.

In contrast to immersing herself in the research of new medicines in her secluded lab, on her day off Saya shows a more energetic side, riding around town on her skateboard.

However, despite being off school, her curiosity that constantly drives her to pursue new things doesn't change.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A custom-made pistol that Saya modified herself.

It's been given a pink design as a fashion statement during her long-awaited holiday.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A pious and sincere girl, Mari is a member of the Sisterhood of Trinity Integrated Academy.

More than just appearing cute at a glance, her calm aura and soft, everlasting smile have charmed the countless students who have called on her for advice. Mari is aware of her own inexperience, and her wish to soon become a fine Sister like her seniors is always on her mind.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Mari's pistol.

Although she always carries it, few people have actually seen Mari shoot it.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A student of Gehenna Academy, Ako is the executive officer of the Disciplinary Committee, and a sort-of secretary to its president Hina.

At first glance she may appear kind and good-natured, but Ako has zero tolerance for students who break the rules. She is constantly at Hina's side, assisting in her duties as president of the Disciplinary Committee. This has prompted other students to call her "Hina's Pet" amongst other things, but Ako doesn't particulary care.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A pistol carried by Ako.

It is a treasured object that was handed to Ako when she got appointed to the position of executive officer in recognition of her painstaking efforts. Ako carries it with her all the time and takes very good care of it.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
The always-cheerful virtual singer who really loves to sing.

Originally a purely electronic existence, the technology of Kivotos has allowed Miku to obtain a real body and stand in the real world. As expected of a singer whose music can overcome time and space, Miku has many secret fans in Kivotos who are eagerly looking forward to the live concert that she's planning to hold in this world.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A huge cannon used by Hatsune Miku to distribute merchandise such as T-shirts during her live performances.

 The surface lights up in sync with the music.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Enrolled at Trinity Integrated Academy, Tsurugi, having sought out a youth's dream of going to the beach, is the president of the Justice Actualization Committee and its strategic weapon.

In her enjoying her time during summer vacation, she works to control her explosive temper while enjoying her youth...

Somehow her time at the summer beach doesn't go according to plan.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Tsurugi's dual shotguns.

They boast extreme firepower, even when used underwater.
DataList.FragmentSources:
* Event Missions, Milestone Rewards, and Shop: 
** [[Summer Sky's Wishlist]]
** [[Summer Sky's Wishlist (Rerun)]]

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A gluttonous girl beloning to Gehenna Academy's Gourmet Research Society who, despite the sultry summer heat, still has a huge appetite.

A watermelon in her right hand, and a cooler box in her left. Still craving more summer gourmet, Izumi headed for the seaside. Chocolate-flavored broiled eel, extremely spicy shaved ice, watermelon topped with chocolate mint - these are just some of the strange things on her fully-loaded summer menu. Izumi's passion in pursuing any and all foods (including the previously-mentioned atrocities) burns as hot as the summer heat itself.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A heavy machine gun used by Izumi.

Come hell or high water, if it's for the sake of summer gourmet - it will be done. Also perfectly waterproof.
DataList.FragmentSources:
*Event Supply Box:
**[[President Hina's Summer Vacation]] (120+ × Shards)
**[[President Hina's Summer Vacation (Rerun)]] (120+ × Shards)

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
The ice witch of Trinity's Supplemental Lessons Club who ended up visiting the seaside for the first time.

Despite thinking she'd just "be her usual cool self" in order to not cause any bother, Azusa's friends just won't leave her be. Not only is this her first ever trip to the seaside, the anxiety invoked by the gazes of those in her vicinity leaves Azusa in a state of restlessness.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
The assault rifle carried by Azusa.

Unlike its owner whose heart pounds with excitement at the sight of the sea, it shines with its usual brilliance.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
The president of the Gehenna Academy's Disciplinary Committee who visited the seaside for a training camp.

Fundamentally someone who doesn't like to put in a lot of effort, she reluctantly visited the beach for training. Both her swimsuit and rubber ring are ones she had when she was younger, having hardly ever played at the beach. Hina attempts to explain this by saying "it'd be a waste if I didn't use them", but deep down she is a little conscious of the fact that her old school swimsuit still fits. Regardless, no matter her appearance, and despite it being summer and being at the beach, her strictness when it comes to public morals doesn't change.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Hina's machine gun that she utilizes as if it were one of her own limbs.

Even at the seaside, the intensity of force it exhibits does not change.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
The cold-hearted specialist of Gehenna Academy's Disciplinary Committee who took part in a summer training camp.

She patrols the seashore along with the other Disciplinary Committee members to stop the problem children from getting carried away in the summer mood. While she doesn't show it, Iori isn't exactly happy with how she's been fighting with the incessant problem kids ever since arriving at the beach.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
The rifle used by Iori when dealing with problems caused by rulebreakers.

Loaded with bullets that have the look of refreshing fizzy drinks, its power cannot be underestimated.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
The instructor of Shanhaijing Senior High School's disciplinary support club "Meihua Yuan", whose body has reverted to that of a little girl after taking Saya's medicine.

Since it was only her body that reverted, it's business as usual...or so Shun would've liked, but for some reason her mind has the tendency to instinctively follow, as if being drawn by her young body.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Shun's sniper rifle.

It seems to be a little heavy for the younger Shun, so she strains to steady the rifle.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
The leader of the secret organization "C&C" of Millennium Science School, who for the purpose of her mission has changed into a bunny girl outfit.

While it certainly has the appearance of something that Neru would never wear, if it's for a mission it can't be helped. Despite regularly enduring various circumstances as part of her mission, it seems that her jacket is one thing Neru simply won't part with.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Neru's dual submachine guns.

Whenever she runs, the connected chains flutter gorgeously through the air.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
An agent of Millennium Science School's secret society "C&C", who this time finds herself directly taking part at the forefront of the operation.

There's an air of excitement around Karin as she puts on her bunny girl costume, despite her saying it's only for the sake of her mission. The increase in glances from those around her naturally make her feel a little uneasy, however.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
An anti-materiel rifle used exclusively by Karin.

Even from far away in the sky, her shots land with unmatched accuracy.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Tomoe is a student of Red Winter Federal Academy, the secretary general of the Red Winter Secretariat, and the first member of Cherino's inner circle.

She is a master storyteller who can make anything sound plausible, and she regularly infuses her loyalty to Chairman Cherino into various speeches. Cherino herself believes that Tomoe is inspired by her charisma and has a sense of loyalty to her, but in reality Tomoe is just blindly adoring Cherino.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Sniper rifle used by Tomoe.

It has a high-magnification scope, and you can find rebels who doubt the authority of Chairman Cherino even from a considerable distance.
DataList.FragmentSources: *Event Milestone Rewards & Hot Spring Management: [[Operation record of No. 227 Hot Spring Resort]]

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Enrolled at Gehenna Academy and in charge of first aid at the Public Morals Committee, Chinatsu happened by the hot spring village while out on a mission.

From ordering new medical supplies to dealing with the Gehenna Hot Springs Development Department, even here there is still plenty of problems that call for her attention. Even so, her expression is softer than usual, perhaps because of the beautiful scenery of the hot spring village and its relaxed atmosphere.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Chinatsu's treasured pistol.

Small and portable, it is perfect for infiltrations into hot spring villages.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Student council president of Red Winter Federal Academy, Cherino is enjoying the No. 227 Hot Spring Resort.

Initially unhappy with the spa resort being built without her permission, she came to the village with the idea that it must be removed and purged. However, upon arrival, Cherino is turned around by Nodoka and her friends and enjoys the hot spring resort to the fullest. Although she was satisfied with the resort building and the food provided, she apparently did not like the hot springs themselves that much.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
The handgun Cherino uses whenever she purges someone.

Apparently is was modified by Tomoe so that it will not rust even in a hot and humid environment like a hot spring village.
DataList.FragmentSources:
*[[Raid]] Shop
*Event Shop
**[[An Academy Club's Story ~ The Two Girls' Wish for the Final Volume ~]] (40× Shards)
**[[An Academy Club's Story ~ The Two Girls' Wish for the Final Volume ~/Rerun]] (40× Shards)

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Nodoka is a student of Red Winter Federal Academy that was suspended from school and confined to Class No. 227 in the old school building, but somehow became the proprietress of "No. 227 Hot Spring Resort".

Newfound hot spring at the old school building has brought in unexpected wealth, however, her troubles seem to have only just begun as other students start to frequent the place, or interfere with business for various reasons.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A submachine gun that Nodoka carries.

It is mostly used to illuminate dark night roads around the hot spring village, but also comes handy for dealing with annoying customers.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Gehenna Academy's self-appointed president of Problem Solver 68 celebrates the New Year.

She spent a lot of money to get her hair done and even rented a kimono to start the new year off with a bang in hopes that Handyman will prosper. With that outfit, Aru's confidence is better than ever, as is her mood. She plays the role of a gracious president, with an elegant walk and a relaxed tone of voice (but on the inside, she is the same as always).
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Aru's antique-style sniper rifle that she always takes care of.

Aru says that as the year changes, this gun has become even more hard-boiled, just like herself...

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A student of Gehenna Academy, Mutsuki is the go-getter of Problem Solver 68.

She is dressed up for the New Year to celebrate the occasion with Aru and her friends. Despite the New Year's spirit, she is still the same bundle of mischief and pranks. As always, she is watching out for Aru, prone to getting into trouble even in the new year, always staying by her side. Mutsuki is a girl of the devilish type who enjoys New Year's in her own way.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A machine gun that Mutsuki always carries with her.

She is all dressed up for the New Year, but still has the gun in her bag. According to Mutsuki, the gun is ready to be taken out at a moment's notice, so pranks can go on.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A member of the Abydos Foreclosure Task Force, who is now employed as a shrine maiden(?).

Serika has been working hard at her various part-time jobs so that she can help the Foreclosure Task Force as much as possible. For the New Year, she chose a shrine maiden's part-time job. Although she is not particularly fond of or knowledgeable about shrine maidens, Serika is, as usual, resolved to do her best at whatever job she's been entrusted with (apparently there is also a matter of getting paid more if you act as becomes a shrine maiden).
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
An assault rifle Serika carries to her part-time job.

Even the part-time job of a shrine maiden is no exception to this rule, and it comes handy to reign in bothersome children who cause trouble to others because it is the New Year.
DataList.FragmentSources: *[[Elimination Raid]] Shop

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Formerly from Hyakkiyako Alliance Academy, Wakamo is one of the "Seven Prisoners" that escaped from Corrections Bureau after being suspended from school.

Known as the Fox of Calamity for her indiscriminate and large-scale destruction, she is widely feared. Her motives and purpose are shrouded in mystery. Her true face, hidden beneath the mask, is rumored to be as scary as a demon or as ugly as the devil.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Wakamo's favorite rifle.

Despite its old-fashioned appearance, it always smells of flames and gunpowder. Nowadays, it is often used against "obstacles" around the teacher.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A lazy student of the Public Safety Bureau of Valkyrie Police Academy.

She enrolled in the Valkyrie Police Academy pursuing the carefree life of a civil servant. Treats any incoming complaints with utter indifference, and enjoys the life of a window-gazer who's not motivated by money nor honor. Her favorite thing to do is to listen to the radio while eating a doughnut.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Standard model rifle provided to Fubuki by Valkyrie Police Academy.

Designed for high power, but performs below expectation due to Fubuki's lackluster maintenance.
DataList.FragmentSources:
*Event Shop and Milestone Rewards: 
**[[Happy Schale ♡ Valentine patrol]]

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Head of the Emergency Medicine Department within Gehenna Academy.

Although she has saved countless people in the course of her career, Sena's habit of calling injured people "corpses" and the rough way she treats patients has made some students shy away from her.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Short-barrel grenade launcher used by Sena.

A tool for quickly removing obstacles during emergency dispatch. Obstacles include those who would interfere with her work.
DataList.FragmentSources: *Grand Assault Coin Shop

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
The deputy director of the hacker group Veritas; member of the Millennium Science School.

Chihiro is a hacker with outstanding programming skills who tries to avoid abusing her abilities. She is the moral compass of Veritas group, which is full of mischievous children, and although Chihiro always gives passionate speeches about "proper hacker ethics" to the club members, she is also willing to put in greyhat work when necessary.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Assault rifle used by Chihiro.

According to her, it's the fastest way to get the encrypted password.
DataList.FragmentSources:
*[[Raid]] Shop
*Event Shop
**[[On your mark @ Millennium]] (50× Shards)
**[[On your mark @ Millennium/Rerun]] (50× Shards)

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Member of the Hyakkiyako Alliance Academy, and a kind vice-president of the discipline club.

Mimori always has a cheerful smile and a gentle demeanor, and she is very popular with everyone. Having been shojo manga fan since young age, she pursues a dream of embodying the "Yamato Nadeshiko" character, to which end she joined the discipline club. Together with her childhood friend and club director Tsubaki she is working hard every day to practice cooking and cleaning.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
An automatic pistol that Mimori carries.

She bought it when she first aspired to becoming an elegant lady, and she takes good care of it every day.
DataList.FragmentSources: *Grand Assault Regular Coin Shop

DataList.HobbyEn: Reading, book management, old book research
DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: Ui belongs to Trinity Integrated Academy and is the chairman of the library committee. She loves books and is also a bit of a misanthrope, although it is unclear which of the two comes first. She is particularly fond of old books, and spends her days in seclusion, deciphering and managing old tomes at a place called the "Antiquarian Bookstore". Her intellectual curiosity and her knowledge of antique books are first-rate, and she is even called the "Sorceress of the Antiquarian Bookstore" by those around her.
DataList.WeaponDescEn: Ui uses this sniper rifle whenever the noise around her is getting too loud. As the name implies, it is capable of making the target quiet.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Hinata is a serious and earnest Sisterhood member from the Trinity Integrated Academy.

She is responsible for the "management of the cathedral and other items", a job she performs faithfully every day. However, she is a bit of a dilettante, and often loses confidence after making a series of mistakes. She carries with surprising ease a large suitcase with various items in it, including a grenade launcher.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A pistol that Hinata always carries.

In peacetime, it is used to help people in need, such as opening a door when they've lost the key.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Marina is the chairman of the security committee in charge of maintaining public order at Red Winter Federal Academy.

She has a reputation for punishing violators of the school rules without question or mercy. Marina is fond of the word "charge" and will repeatedly charge at anything. Always the first to jump into the fray whenever there is a problem in Red Winter, she is certainly faithful to her duties, but she often gets lost as a result of her charges.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A submachine gun with a drum magazine that Marina loves.

Its astounding rate of fire mercilessly attacks those who doubt the authority of Red Winter.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: Miyako is the leader of RABBIT platoon belonging to SRT Special Academy. She enrolled in the SRT Special Academy admiring the success of her seniors, only to find her school suddenly closed. She is now living in the park with fellow platoon members. Her facial expressions do not change much and she rarely shows her emotions, so people around Miyako tend to think that she is unsociable. However, deep down inside, she is always concerned about the members of her platoon and has a kind heart. Her callsign is "RABBIT1".
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Regulation submachine gun issued to Miyako by the SRT Special Academy.

It is a highly reliable gun and can effectively repel the enemy even under extreme circumstances.
DataList.FragmentSources: *[[Tactical Challenge]] shop

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A sniper of the RABBIT platoon belonging to SRT Special Academy.

She enrolled SRT Special Academy because of her talent as a sniper, only to find her school suddenly closed. She is now living in the park with fellow platoon members. Miyu has a weak presence, which in itself is useful for sniper missions, but she is often forgotten not only by the enemies but also by her allies. Her callsign is "RABBIT 4".
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Regulation sniper rifle issued to Miyu by the SRT Special Academy.

Finely made and boasts an amazing accuracy.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: Saki is the point man of the RABBIT platoon, belonging to SRT Special Academy. She entered the SRT Special Academy in search of a life based on strict rules and regulations, but the academy was suddenly shut down. Saki now lives in a park with other members of the same platoon, always carrying around an SRT tactics manual, and is basically the type of person who always focuses on following the principles of the school. She enjoys foraging for wild vegetables and other scavenged items, which seems to be of great use in the current scarcity of resources in the park. Her callsign is "RABBIT2".
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Regulation machine gun issued to Saki by the SRT Special Academy.

Requires arduous maintenance due to its construction, this gun boasts significant firepower as long as it is maintained properly.

DataList.HobbyEn: Inventing new ninjutsu and making videos
DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: A student of Hyakkiyako Alliance Academy and director of the Ninjutsu Research Department, Michiru is always full of unfounded self-confidence. She is an otaku who loves ninja movies, anime, and goods. Michiru is running around with the members of the Ninjutsu Research Department today to let everyone throughout Kivotos know of the greatness of ninjas.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Michiru's beloved shotgun.

Numerous modifications and additional parts are attached so that special ammo can be shot for use in her own ninjutsu. It seems difficult to use, but Michiru says, "That's part of the style!"
DataList.FragmentSources: *Card Drawing during Event: [[Shinobi's Heart]]

DataList.HobbyEn: Mischief (she tries to hold back as much as possible), catching beetles
DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A student of Hyakkiyako Alliance Academy, an energetic member of the discipline club.

Originally, she was a mischievous child from a rural Hyakkiyako countryside, but the moment she met Tsubaki and Mimori, Kaede decided to join the discipline club saying "I want to be such a wonderful lady!". She is studying every day to get closer to her ideals, but most of the training leads to trouble for some reason.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A pistol that Kaede always carries.

It is actually a flare gun, and is used to signal when student is having a problem or when they find a rare Mushiqueen card.
DataList.FragmentSources:
*[[Elimination Raid]] Shop
*Event Shop
**[[Get Hyped and March On!]] (40× Shards)
**[[Get Hyped and March On!/Rerun]] (40× Shards)

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: One of the members of "Pandemonium Society" within Gehenna Academy. She's easily irritable and tries to slack from her duties. Those attempts are repeatedly blocked by fellow Pandemonium members (specifically, Makoto). Pandemonium officer's days are always busy with problems to solve and tasks that have to be done, even if one finds them annoying. Ibuki, Pandemonium Society's mascot, always helps to keep Iroha's spirit up, and so, with a sigh, she continues to carry out her daily duties.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A pistol carried by Iroha.

Being the tank commander of Pandemonium, she rarely uses it, and she always says that even at this size it is annoying to carry around, but even so, the fact that it is always neatly maintained speaks of Iroha's character.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A member of the Ninjutsu Research Club of Hyakkiyako Academy.

Tsukuyo grew up tall in an early age, and she was often teased for her physique, and as a result, her current reclusive personality was formed. Tsukuyo is a timid person and isn't good at communicating to others, but she also has the strength to jump into any situation once she sets her mind to it. Although she is not very familiar with the ways of ninja yet, she seems to be enjoying her time in the Ninjutsu Research Club with her senior Michiru, and Izuna.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A submachine gun that Tsukuyo cherishes.

Tsukuyo is not good at handling guns, so Michiru and Izuna have added various decorations and modifications for her. It's irreplaceable for Tsukuyo, and at the crucial moments she holds the barrel even more tenderly.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: Hiyori is a petulant and melancholic member of the Arius Squad. She has low self-esteem, usually sees things in a negative light and is often self-deprecating when it comes to herself. She is occasionally seen carrying a heavy luggage on her back and following slightly behind everyone else.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Sniper rifle used by Hiyori.

The 20mm bullets strike true, asserting their presence on the gunfire-filled battlefield.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Misaki belongs to Arius Branch School. She is an Arius Squad girl of few words and strikes others as unsociable.

Misaki has little interest in others or herself, and sometimes acts out of desperation. Her wrists and neck are covered with thick bandages as if to hide something.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Rocket launcher used by Misaki.

After firing, when it reaches a certain altitude, it separates into multiple munitions and causes a widespread explosion.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A mysterious Arius Squad girl who belongs to the Arius Branch School and always wears a gas mask.

While Atsuko doesn't use the gas mask expressly for the purpose of hiding her face, she lives mostly wearing the mask, except when eating or sleeping.
She is called "princess" by the squad leader Saori, but her background is a mystery as Atsuko doesn't share much about herself.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A submachine gun used by Atsuko.

It has a heavy firepower for its short barrel, and is especially suited for close quarters combat.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Formerly from Hyakkiyako Alliance Academy and one of the "Seven Prisoners", Wakamo blooms ever more brilliantly in the summer.

She visits the seaside in a bathing suit just to show herself off to the teacher. She smiles brightly because she just met her teacher. No matter how hot the summer sun is, she attacks her teacher with a passionate approach that is second to none. She is the summer version of a girl who is still more in love than anyone else.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Wakamo's favorite rifle.

Like Wakamo's buoyant mood with the arrival of summer, rifle's muzzle blooms scorching crimson sparks against all who stand in its way.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A member of the Foreclosure Task Force of Abydos, Nonomi seems to have a lot of fun after arriving to the seaside.

Even at the resort, she continues to kindly look out for her friends. As an aside, she seems to have bought more than usual because she was so excited about this trip.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Machine gun that protects Nonomi even in midsummer.

The bullets it spits out refreshingly blow away the heat.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
The treasurer of the Foreclosure Task Force of Abydos High School, Ayane has come to the summer seaside.

Although she intended to forget the usual duties and enjoy herself for a while..., Ayane quickly fell back to her usual seriousness.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Ayane's gun, which she hopes will never be used.

However, that wish is always dashed in unexpected ways.
DataList.FragmentSources:
*Event Supply Box:
**[[Abydos Resort Restoration Committee]] (160+ × Shards)

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A young, lazy girl from Abydos High School and president of the Foreclosure Task Force. Hoshino came to the uninhabited island in search of a relaxing summer.

Despite to her laid back attitude, she is surprisingly well prepared for the trip. However, she does not seem to be aware that she is a little more aggressive than usual.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Hoshino's shotgun prepared for the summer seaside.

It is ready a variety of uses, such as cutting through animal trails and catching insects.

DataList.HobbyEn: Studying ninja arts, escorting her lord
DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A member of Ninjutsu Research Club of Hyakkiyako, Izuna's training brings her to the sea.

Izuna is usually a bundle of energy even on regular days, and this time, surrounded by the lively summer atmosphere, she is 200% energetic. Today, Izuna is enjoying the summer by training alongside her lord, in order to become a proficient summertime ninja.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Izuna's beloved submachine gun.

Because it is a proper state-of-the-art ninja implement, it is of course fully waterproof! In other words, it can be used even at the sea. Only the best ninja tools are fit to serve the Lord.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Chise is a naturally-airheaded girl from the Yin-Yang club of Hyakkiyako, who is still as absentmided as ever even under the summer sun.

She may have improved her idol power (?) by changing into a swimsuit, and the passion of her fans overshadowns even the blazing summer sun. However, she didn't seem to be aware of it at all. Today, Chise is spending a fulfilling summer day with her teacher, looking at the glittering lights and poking a turtle.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Chise's valued grenade launcher.

This time, on a suggestion from the teacher, a haiku about summer written by Chise is engraved on the round. It is of personal importance to Chise and will not be available on the market.

DataList.HobbyEn: Serving customers with charm, attracting people into her shop
DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A student of Hyakkiyako, Shizuko is the president of the festival management committee, full of ambition even in summer.

She is passionate about growing Momoyo Hall into the best franchise in Kivotos. In the summer, no obstacle is too large to overcome with her idol charm and no dreams are out of reach!
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A pump-action shotgun that Shizuko cherishes even an the summer seaside.

As usual, it is trailed by the faint sweet scent of anmitsu.
DataList.FragmentSources:
*Event Shop:
**[[Business Trip! The Momoyodou Beach House Franchise Plan!]]

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Member of the Arius Branch School, and the leader of the Arius Squad, an elite special force unit within the school.

Saori is typically cool-headed and does not hesitate to use any means necessary to achieve her goals, though a passionate personality that sometimes reveals itself. An unrivaled expert in guerrilla tactics, the daily life sometimes shows a somewhat naive side of hers. The combat prowess of the Arius Squad is the result of her watchful oversight of their training.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Assault rifle used by Saori.

Customized by Saori in pursuit of efficiency. Once the prey is in sight, it never misses its shots until the target is brought down.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
An operator of the RABBIT platoon belonging to SRT Special Academy. Her callsign is "RABBIT3".

Moe enlisted in the SRT Special Academy because of its focus on firepower, but the academy was suddenly shut down and now she is sleeping outdoors with the other platoon members in the park. She's got a weird taste for blowing things up and ruining things, but she's a solid operator. Moe also has a serious sweet tooth and is rarely seen without a candy bar in her mouth.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A standard pistol that Moe received from SRT Special Academy.

In spite of being a pistol, it has a high rate of fire and can empty its magazine in a blink.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A member of Trinity Integrated Academy's After School Sweets Club with a laid-back and quiet personality.

Preferring to avoid the spotlight, she usually follows along with the other club members.
Kazusa is always having a hard time getting caught up in the eccentricities of those around her, but she also cherishes those moments.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A machine gun that has been with Kazusa for a long time.

When asked about the origin of its name, she looks bitter.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A first-year student of Shanhaijing Senior High School, Kokona works as an instructor in the "Meihua Yuan" disciplinary support department.

Although young enough to still be attending elementary school, she has been recognized for her excellent learning ability and has been given the authority of an instructor.
The students affectionately call her "Kokona-chan", but Kokona isn't very happy about that.
DataList.WeaponDescEn: An assault rifle that is effective both in protecting the dignity of a lady and in fulfilling her duties as an instructor.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
The club leader of the Engineering Club dressed in the cheerleader costume for the grand athletic festival.

Although she was hastily drafted for the cheerleader role, like a meister who does her best, her passion burns hotter than any other cheering squad member. With that overabundance of passion, she sometimes forgets her original task...
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A simple submachine gun owned by Utaha.

It is stored inside Rai-chan so that it does not get in the way while cheering.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Member of the Millennium Science School, secretary of the "Seminar" student council.

Noa mainly records seminar decisions and meeting minutes, and is also in charge of the patent attorney's duties of identifying and registering patents for products developed by Millennium students. She has a very good memory and can almost perfectly memorize whatever she sees and hears once.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Pistol with a conversion kit used by Noa.

With the stock extended, it can be fired like a submachine gun.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A member of the engineering club dressed in a cheerleader costume for the grand athletic festival.

Using the sewing skills that she has cultivated through her usual cosplay hobby, she made the costumes worn by the engineers. Hibiki seems to be a little worried about her skirt length, probably because she reused the one she made a long time ago.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Hibiki's fondly used mortar.

It is stored in a caddy bag so that it can be easily carried while cheering.
DataList.FragmentSources: *Event Milestone Rewards & Athletic Stadium Schedule: [[On_your_mark_＠_Millennium|On your mark ＠ Millennium]]

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A member of the Millennium Science School, and an agent of "C&C", Akane changed into a bunny girl outfit for an infiltration mission.

Even in an unfamiliar environment, she can be seen calmly carrying out her mission, taking the initiative in preparing her bunny outfit and clearing obstacles by detonating C4. She seems excited by her unusual attire, occasinaly flashing a mischievous smile.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A pistol that Akane always carries.

Nothing is more suitable for an infiltration mission.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A member of the Millennium Science School, Seminar's treasurer changed into gym clothes for the Kourin Taisai Festival.

Although she had been occupied with hard work preparing for the big event hosted by Millennium, she is currently in excellent shape, having rested well only the day before the opening of the festival, thanks to the consideration of other students. Yuuka, an officer of the student council of the host school and a member of the executive committee, tried to approach the competition rationally, but the passion for victory over the other participating schools seems to stimulate her competitive spirit.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A pair of submachine guns used by Yuuka.

This time around, Logic & Reason will represent Yuuka's rational and reasoned judgments at the sports festival.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A student of Trinity Integrated Academy, and a member of the Sisterhood, Mari changed into gym clothes to participate in the Kourin Taisai Festival.

She volunteered to work as a committee member for the festival that was supposed to promote peace in Kivotos, only to find out that there was constant conflict and trouble. This, coupled with her kind nature which makes her unable to leave others in peril, seems to keep Mari involved in all sorts of disputes.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Mari's pistol.

Usually it's used peacefully as a signal to announce the start of a game... but sometimes it unintentionally ends up with the muzzle pointing at delinquent students.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Enrolled at Trinity Integrated Academy, the vice-chairman of the Justice Actualization Committee changed into gym clothes for the Kourin Taisai Festival.

She was assigned to replace Tsurugi, who was unfamiliar with external affairs, as a member of the executive committee. Despite the exuberant atmosphere at the venue, Hasumi has been trying to calmly fulfill her duties as a committee member, but the unending cavalcades of delinquent students and the sweet temptations wafting from the food stalls are making the job harder.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Hasumi's favorite sniper rifle.

Her muzzle flashes during the Kourin Taisai Festival to judge any wrongdoers.
DataList.FragmentSources: *Event Milestone Rewards & Dice Run minigame: [[Get Set, Go!]]

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Enrolled at Millennium Science School, the former director of the hacker group "Veritas" and the current director of the Supernatural Phenomenon Task Force.
