A self-proclaimed super genius and sickly beautiful girl hacker, who is said to be an owner of the "Omniscience" degree, something only three people in the history of Millennium could claim. ...it's not entirely clear if that is true or whether such degree even exists. According to Himari, a girl with many secrets is alluring... She is also a leading genius hacker, and at the same time, has a penchant for all things occult.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A pistol owned by Himari.

It is a simple and beautifully crafted gun. It's quite unusual to see Himari use it. "Naturally, one doesn't get to see the most delicate mountain flowers easily ...just like me, aren't they?", Himari says.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A student of the Red Winter Federation Academy, she is presently assigned to the Special Class No. 227 in the old school building after being suspended.

The reason for the suspension was an act of secretly mixing alcohol into kompot ration. She is a childhood friend of Nodoka, who is also in the Special Class No. 227, and rumor has it that Shigure deliberately caused the accident after Nodoka was sent to special class as a result of disciplinary action. Regardless of the truth of the matter, she loves her homemade kompot, and always carries it in her pocket flask.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A grenade launcher that Shigure usually carries around.

As the name implies, any opponents hit directly by its high-explosive projectile will be dizzy.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Student of Trinity Integrated Academy and a member of the Rescue Knights, Serina changed into Santa's costume for Christmas.

This costume seems fitting for Christmas street volunteering. As she sings carols and delivers handmade gifts, Serina looks like an angel that descended on Christmas.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Serina's assault rifle.

May not fire syringes, but it still administers Serina's help on the battlefield.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Student of Trinity Integrated Academy and a member of the Rescue Knights, Hanae changed into Santa's costume for Christmas.

Bouncy as ever, she chose Santa clothes that are easy to move around in. For Hanae, who enjoys everything, Christmas is just like a festival. She volunteers to ring the bells, helps with gift wrapping, and spreads holiday cheer to everyone.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Hanae's assault rifle.

Even at Christmas, her gun spreads happy smiles.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Enrolled at Gehenna Academy, the club president of the Gourmet Research Society, Haruna changed into a kimono for the new year celebrations.

Believeing that dressing up for the occasion is an important part of exploring gastronomy, she walks the path of gastronomy in a fine kimono. Haruna is the most elegant young lady in sight, but...

Let's hope that she is served food worthy of her expectations.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
The sniper rifle used by Haruna.

As the years go by, this gun remains the perfect companion in her gastronomic quest.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A member of Gehenna Academy's Gourmet Research Society, Junko changed into a kimono for the New Year.

Looking forward to New Year's cooking, Junko has a new look. She still absolutely can't stand being disturbed when she eats.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Twin assault rifles used by Junko.

No one is allowed to interfere with her gastronomic expolaration.
DataList.FragmentSources: * [[A Game Before the New Year's Feast ~ One-and-Done Match ~]] event omikuji draw

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Belonging to Gehenna Academy's School Lunch Club, Fuuka changed into a kimono for the New Year..

She's hoping for peaceful days this year, but it's still unknown if the universe will allow it.
DataList.WeaponNameEn: School Lunch Club self-defense gun type A
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A submachine gun that Fuuka always carries.

As the new year begins, Fuuka hopes that it won't be used, but things often don't go as they should in the world...

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Member of Trinity Integrated Academy, Captain of the Rescue Knights. Mine is a white-clad warrior with strong will and bold personality, although she also has a radical side.

Common wisdom about Rescue Knights across Trinity is "Mine breaks it and the Knights heal". Despite this, Mine is known to spend her free time diligently maintaining her own equipment and inviting acquaintances to tea parties. Her deep appreciation and knowledge of teas is on par with Hasumi from the Justice Actualization Committee.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Mine's shotgun.

Rescue, she argues, is sometimes a two-sided process. This weapon may be the clue for her claim...

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Student of Trinity Integrated Academy and the former leader of "Pater", one of the student unions that make up Trinity.

Mika is a former member of the Tea Party and is also a childhood friend of its leader, Nagisa. However, because of their opposing political positions, they make a clear distinction between their public and private lives. Mika always presents a happy smile and innocent appearance, but she seems to be troubled by something she's unable to confide in others.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A submachine gun that Mika loves.

A previously nondescript Trinity submachine gun that Mika passionately decorated. Now it has a special appearance that shines like a star even in the darkness. Works for Mika anytime, anywhere.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: A student of Gehenna Academy, Megu is at the heart of the Hot Springs Development Department, and a work team leader at the development site. She believes from the bottom of her heart that "demolition" is an answer to any problem. Megu is trusted by fellow members of the Hot Springs Development Department for her lively personality and outstanding demolition skills.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
It is no exaggeration to say that Megu and her flamethrower are one in the field.

Because it emits a tremendous amount of heat, nobody else can handle it. Megu enjoyed the unique nickname, originally coined by others, so it stuck.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: A student of Valkyrie Police Academy, Kanna serves as head of the Public Peace Bureau. She is known by the 'Mad Dog' nickname for her relentless pursuit of truth in the criminal investigations. Her threatening demeanor and nickname may lead some to assume that Kanna is a violent person, but in fact she is always calm and pragmatic.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A standard handgun issued by the Valkyrie Police Academy.

Although it has a simple design, it is light and easy to operate.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A devout student of the Sisterhood belonging to Trinity Integrated Academy.

Sakurako is widely trusted by other students for her serious attitude. However, being too serious, she sometimes deviates from trends and common sense.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A gun that is as impeccably and reverently maintained as Sakurako herself.

Few others can reach it.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A member of the Millennium Science School, the fifth agent of its secret "C&C" agency.

Although she belongs to C&C, Toki has been working as Rio's exclusive maid and bodyguard until now, so few people are familiar with her. A superior agent who fights based with high-tech weaponry. Until now, Toki has mainly acted alone, but she actually has a lonely side.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Assault rifle used by Toki.

It has the performance to match its appearance, and eliminates all targets that interfere with her mission. Toki didn't choose the name, somebody else named it.

DataList.HobbyEn: Collecting tea leaves, making sweets, tending the garden
DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Affiliated with Trinity Integrated Academy, she is the leader of "Filius", one of the student union bodies that make up Trinity, and the host of the "Tea Party" student council.

Nagisa is refined and soft-spoken, but rarely reveals her true feelings, making her a complicated and mysterious character. Her hobby is preparing tea leaves and sweets for tea parties. She dreams of a day when many Trinity students would be invited to a tea party of hers.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
The pistol that Nagisa uses.

Because of its classical design, it seems perfectly in place at a tea party. It is often used to drive away uninvited guests who would assault the dignity of a tea ceremony.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Genius girl from the Millennium Science School, Koyuki is a troublemaker member of the "Seminar" student council.

Koyuki is a prodigy when it comes to analyzing probabilities, although she herself is completely unaware of it. Koyuki likes games of chance, and constantly tries her luck in various ways. Even when she is in trouble, she never gives up.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Koyuki's trusted machine gun.

The color got changed when it was sent in for repairs. It's a sturdy gun, and Koyuki doesn't mind the minute details.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Section Chief of Problem Solver 68 and student of Gehenna Academy.

Although she only dressed up for the New Year to match the other members, her bearing and demeanor are dignified, as if she was wearing kimonos on a regular basis. Kayoko finds the commotion bothersome, but she is willing to lend her wisdom for the sake of Problem Solver 68.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A handgun that Kayoko usually carries.

The loud roaring noise it makes with each shot comes useful not only for chasing away rude clients, but also for warding off evil in the new year.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Rank-and-file member of Gehenna Academy's Problem Solver 68, Haruka is celebrating the New Year.

Haruka is not used to spending holidays with close friends, but she dressed up in clothes she would not normally wear, in order to fit in with everyone else.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A shotgun that Haruka uses to exterminate "pests".

Of course, it's also used when really exterminating pests.

DataList.HobbyEn: Promoting Hyakkiyako culture, Collecting Hyakkiyako merchandise
DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Hyakkiyako Alliance Academy Deputy Director of the Yin-Yang club and Lead Strategist of the Cultural Tourism Industry Public Relations Support Department.

Kaho loves Hyakkiyako culture more than anyone else and cares deeply about the students who contribute to it. Because of her appearance, some Hyakkiyako students have been known to refer to her as "Kaho-san, who is more of a department head than that actual department head". Incidentally, she is also a valued straight man of the Yin-Yang club.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A rifle that Kaho usually uses.

It was custom-made by her to convey the wonders of Hyakkiyako. Not only is it useful for publicity, but its also powerful enough to pacify the school's delinquents.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A member of the Game development club from Millennium Science School, Arisu decided to wear a maid outfit for various reasons.

Although she's still not used to wearing maid clothes, she seems to be training every day to level up and become a full-fledged maid hero.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Arisu's railgun.

 Taking advantage of its sheer firepower, it was decided that it ought to be used for sniping this time. Is it difficult to snipe with a railgun? Either way, the target ends up obliterated, it can be called a sniper.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
An agent of the secret "C&C" agency from Millennium Science School, Toki believes bunny girl clothes to be a good fit for infiltration operations.

She seems to be a little more excited than usual, having been assigned to an undercover mission, something she didn't get much chance to do before. Toki seems to be pleased to get the chance to do the same mission as C&C seniors, but tries to maintain a calm professional demeanor.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Assault rifle used by Toki.

She claims it's just as good for covert operations as it is regular missions, and proceeds to prove it by her own hand.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Club president of the Game Development Club of Millennium Science School, Yuzu somehow ended up wearing a maid outfit for various reasons.

Yuzu is timid as usual, even though she's dressed differently, but it seems she's been able to be a little more outgoing. Together with the other members of the Game Development Club, she is going to face various obstacles.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Yuzu's grenade launcher.

Can shoot grenades anytime, anywhere, even out of a box.
DataList.FragmentSources:
* Event Missions and Minigame:
** [[Alabaster Calling Card ~ Mansion Masquerade and the Essence of Beauty ~]]
** [[Alabaster Calling Card ~ Mansion Masquerade and the Essence of Beauty ~/Rerun|Alabaster Calling Card ~ Mansion Masquerade and the Essence of Beauty ~ (Rerun)]]

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A member of Trinity Integrated Academy's Vigilante Corps, who patrols all over Trinity and works to maintain public order.

People at times take her to be a mischievous child because Reisa says things that don't make sense, but she's more serious about the vigilante activities than anyone else around. She has a habit of referring to herself by different names.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Reisa's prized shotgun. The lovingly customized body just shouts "Reisa" no matter how you look at it.

Despite the cute appearance, it retains the marks of the many battles it must have passed through.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Rumi is a member of Shanhaijing Senior High School and the chairman of the gourmet Black Tortoise Promenade. 

Under her extraordinary management Black Tortoise Promenade grew from a mediocre shopping street into one of the best gourmet districts in Kivotos. Although she is at odds with the Hyakkiyako student council, who are wary of her growing influence, Rumi herself seems to have no interest in anything other than developing the enterprise.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Rumi's favorite submachine gun. 

Its name tells one to "seek the old wisdom to learn something new", but it seems she herself prefers the "new" part.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Executive Officer of Genryumon, Shanhaijing's student council, and the Student Council President's personal bodyguard.

 Despite her calm and collected demeanor, she's a hardcore classic noir movie buff. She likes to quote scenes and lines from movies, although often incorrectly. She gets into trouble trying to be cool at inappropriate times, but Genryumon members do their best to mitigate the damage.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Mina's favorite pair of pistols. 

White Tiger goes on the right, Black Dragon on the left. They, she claims, are her best friends in arms. There may be times when style takes precedence over logic.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: Student of the Red Winter Federal Academy, and head of the Labor Party. Minori will send workers to any place where manpower is needed, such as large-scale civil engineering and construction projects, and direct them on-site. Although good at her job, Minori seems to be infamous with her employers for going on strikes and demonstrations over trivial matters...
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Minori's beloved sturdy assault rifle.

As its name suggests, this assault rifle of simple construction has silently lit the way on Minori's path of struggle.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Leader of RABBIT platoon belonging to SRT Special Academy, Miyako is visiting a fishing village for an infiltration operation.

She decided to change into a swimsuit to investigate the mysterious disappearance of shrimp from the convenience store lunch box. The fishing village they are infiltrating is hardly a beach tourist hotspot, but it seems girls coudn't miss a chance to wear their cute swimsuits.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Regulation submachine gun issued to Miyako by the SRT Special Academy.

It is a highly reliable gun that can be operated efficiently even in hot and humid seashore conditions.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
The point man of the SRT Special Academy RABBIT platoon, Saki is visiting a fishing village for an infiltration operation.

Ever eager to run the operation strictly by the book, she brought along a bag of combat equipment even though it shouldn't really be necessary on an infiltration mission. Even in the swimsuit, her seriousness seems to be unchanged.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Regulation machine gun issued to Saki by the SRT Special Academy.

It's vulnerable to humidity and salt, so it malfunctions frequently at the oceanside, but it's not a big deal for meticulous Saki.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A sniper of the SRT Special Academy RABBIT platoon, Miyu is visiting a fishing village for an infiltration operation.

Miyu brought her fishing tackle to blend in and spends most of her time at the docks. Occasional big catch may attract the attention of those around, but her natural lack of presence remains strong even in this peculiar village.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Regulation sniper rifle issued to Miyu by the SRT Special Academy.

Thanks to the simple and reliable construction of the bolt action, it can snipe enemies without failure in strong sea breezes.
DataList.FragmentSources:
*Event Milestone Rewards & Dice Run minigame:
** [[Summer Special Operation! RABBIT Squad and the Mystery of the Missing Shrimp]]
** [[Summer Special Operation! RABBIT Squad and the Mystery of the Missing Shrimp/Rerun]]

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
The field captain of Abydos High School's Foreclosure Task Force arrives at a deserted island resort in the middle of summer.

Shiroko will take the lead in resort reconstruction and food gathering efforts. She seems to be rather enthusiastic about being in a survival environment; despite changing into a swimsuit, it seems that her own pace did not change.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Shiroko's cherished assault rifle is with her even at the seaside.

Being maintained even more meticulously than usual, it seems to work fine even in sea water.

DataList.HobbyEn: Reading, book management, old book research
DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: A member of the Trinity Integrated Academy and the chairman of the library committee, Ui came to investigate the ruins. She's not very good at going outside and exercising, but she loves old books, ruins, and relics, so she seems to take this opportunity for research seriously.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Ui's sniper rifle is with her even on this rare outing.

It's getting a lot of use even though the place was supposed to be quiet.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Trinity's Supplemental Lessons Club member is visiting an island for the summer.

Although she is dressed somewhat boldly, her usual testy behavior has faded away, and she seems to have bared her heart to the world.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Hanako's assault rifle that she brought to the sea.

She still won't tell what the name means, but it's a bit easier to guess now.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A member of the Trinity Integrated Academy, Koharu came to the island to monitor Sensei.

As a member of the Justice Actualization Committee, she won't tolerate anything that disturbs public morals! Although she is bound by her mission, Koharu also thinks that a vacation on an island wouldn't be a bad idea either.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Koharu's sniper rifle refitted for the ruins survey mission.

It appears to be well-prepared to operate in the humidity and sea breezes.
DataList.FragmentSources:
* Event Missions and Minigame:
** [[In Search of a Hidden Heritage ~ Trinity's Extracurricular Activities ~]]
** [[In Search of a Hidden Heritage ~ Trinity's Extracurricular Activities ~/Rerun|In Search of a Hidden Heritage ~ Trinity's Extracurricular Activities ~ (Rerun)]]

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Sisterhood member from the Trinity Integrated Academy, Hinata heads to the island together with friends to help with the ruins investigation.

The circumstances are different, but the essence of her help did not change. She seems to be a little more cafefree than usual in the laid-back atmosphere of the island.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A pistol that Hinata always carries.

It sees plenty of use outside of battle, such as knocking down fruit from high trees.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: Member of the Hyakkiyako Alliance Academy and a vice-president of its discipline club, Mimori wears a swimsuit to match the seaside setting. Normally gentle and composed, she seems to be a little more playful now that she's wearing a swimsuit.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Mimori's automatic pistol.

The Yamato Nadeshiko training continues wherever and whenever, even during a seaside vacation.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A student of the Red Winter Federal Academy, and a member of the "Knowledge Liberation Front" Library Committee.

Unlike Momiji, a fellow Knowledge Liberation Front member, Meru not only enjoys consuming literary works, but also creates them herself. Her pen name is "Meruri". Meru's namamono doujins are often inspired by the relationships between students who either seem to be on good terms or especially at odds with with each other. Her works are particularly known outside the school for featuring rivalries between Trinity and Gehenna students.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A pistol made specially for Meru.

This gun embodies her struggles. She couldn't think of a better name, so she chose this one.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Momiji is the bookworm girl from Red Winter Federal Academy, and a member of the "Knowledge Liberation Front".

Unlike other Red Winter students who fight for bread and snacks, her struggle lies in adding more books to the library. Momiji's quite the otaku, so the book purchase requests she regularly files are clearly driven by personal interests. As a result, most of her requests so far have been rejected, but Momiji continues to submit them without giving up.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A portable RPG used by Momiji.

If you follow the rules properly, this "rule" need never be triggered.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A member of the Millennium Science Schools' Engineering Club, this time Kotori is wearing a cheerleader uniform to cheer everyone on during the grand athletic festival.

While cheering in a spirited and upbeat voice, she still never fails to provide the usual helpful explanations and commentaries.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Kotori's machine gun, also known as "EX-Plain".

It has been slightly remodeled for the grand athletic festival.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Enrolled at Gehenna Academy, the club president of the Gourmet Research Society, Haruna changed into gym clothes for the grand athletic festival.

Her quest for gourmet food continues anytime and anywhere, and so she wanders around in search of delicacies that can only be tasted at Kivotos's biggest athletic festival, Kivotos Kourin Taisai. Surrounded by all the excitements of the event, Haruna seems to be enjoying herself even more than usual.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Haruna's sniper rifle.

One can never be too cautious when walking the path of gastronomy.

DataList.HobbyEn: Helping people, trying her hand at various jobs
DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: A member of the Justice Actualization Committee of Trinity Academy, Ichika always has a calm expression on her face. As a member of the Justice Actualization Committee, she is primarily in charge of mediation between students. Ichika maintains coirdial relationships with other schools as well. Her amiable personality should not be mistaken for something innate, it is a conscious result of continuous work.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Ichika's assault rifle has been with her through all sorts of hardships.

Despite its carefully manicured exterior, this fierce weapon is well-prepared to do whatever is needed.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: A student of Gehenna Academy, and manager of its Hot Springs Development Department. Kasumi insists that any land with a natural spring must be developed into a hot spring, and once a suitable location has been found she will do whatever it takes to blast through the ground with complete disregard for the surroundings. Although she enjoys full support from fellow club members, her language and actions are those of a wanted criminal.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A handgun that Kasumi carries around.

She often shoots into the air, to liven up the atmosphere. Despite the diminutive appearance, its actual firepower is also considerable.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A suspended student of the Red Winter Federation Academy, Shigure is presently assigned to the Special Class No. 227 whose students run Hot Spring Resort No. 227.

After hot spring suddenly burst up on the old school building grounds, Shigure and Nodoka decided to operate a hot spring village resort. Unlike Nodoka, she doesn't seem interested in making the hot spring village prosperous, Shigure seems satisfied with the environment where she could make a variety of drinks and sweets.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A grenade launcher that Shigure usually carries around.

The sight of Shigure masterfully loading a grenade as if swinging a shaker has been well-received by customers as one of the highlights of Hot Spring Resort No. 227.

DataList.HobbyEn: Browsing magazines at the convenience store, collecting Gekota goods
DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A junior student at Tokiwadai Middle School, Misaka Mikoto is one of only seven top Level 5 psychics across the entire Academy City.

Her superpower is "Electromaster", which allows her to freely manipulate powerful electrical currents. However, since her transfer to Kivotos she seems to have trouble using her abilities to their full potential. Mikoto has a kind-hearted and frank character, and is well-liked by other students. She is a fan of the frog mascot Gekota.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Specialty firearm made by the Engineering Club for Misaka Mikoto.

It comes equipped with "special" functions for those with electrical abilities.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
An elegant junior student from Tokiwadai Middle School.

She is a prominent leader of the largest faction at the prestigious Tokiwadai School, and is one of only seven Level 5 psychics in Academy City. Her superpower is "Mental Out", which allows her to manipulate the minds of others. However, since her transfer to Kivotos Misaki seems to have trouble using her abilities to their full potential.

Misaki has something of a rivalry with a fellow Level 5 psychic, Misaka Mikoto, whose power conflicts with her own abilities.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Specialty firearm made by the Engineering Club for Shokuhou Misaki.

A sleek handgun that is perfect as a fashion statement for high school girls.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A cheerful junior student from Sakugawa Middle School. She is best friends with a classmate Uiharu Kazari, who introduced Ruiko to Misaka Mikoto, her senior at Tokiwadai Middle School.

Although she is a Level 0 with no special powers, Ruiko has good intuition and often finds crucial clues others would miss. Her favorite things are urban legends and sweets. On her days off, she often goes out to try out new desserts.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Specialty firearm made by the Engineering Club for Saten Ruiko.

It's strong enough not to break even if you take a swing at something with it.
DataList.FragmentSources: * Event and Supply Box: [[A Certain Scientific Blue Archive]]

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A first-year member of the Hyakkiyako Alliance Academy and the Hyakkaryouran Dispute Mediation Committee.

Yukari is the heiress of the venerable Kadenokouji family. However, rather than inheriting the family business, she decided to pursue her dream of joining Hyakkaryoran. She takes pride in being a member of Hyakkaryouran and has a lot of energy. Although she sometimes falters, she has the strength of character to recover quickly. She respects her seniors, and especially admires Nagusa among them.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A Hyakkaryouran standard rifle used by Yukari.

It is a symbol of long-held admiration, and a proof of her determination to reach for her goals through hard work. The heart contained therein can never be defeated.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Renge is a member of the Hyakkiyako Academy and the head of the Hyakkaryouran Dispute Mediation Committee.

She has a strong sense of justice and is very compassionate. While Renge cares deeply for her juniors, she is also known by them to be a very strict and uncompromising instructor. She has no regrets about joining Hyakkaryouran, but Renge is concerned that she is missing out on enjoying her youth to its fullest. Perhaps as a reaction to this, she is pursuing the kind of adolescence that is depicted in manga and novels, pushing forward with her training, filled with excitement at the prospect of meeting her destiny.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Renge's favorite rifle.

It's Hyakkaryouran standard rifle modified by Renge. It is said to be a reliable partner during an assault. Renge's marksmanship with this rifle is unrivaled.

DataList.HobbyEn: Cat's cradle, reading military books, sunbathing
DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: Kikyou is a member of the Hyakkiyako Academy and the operational staff member of the Hyakkaryouran Dispute Mediation Committee. She deeply values common sense, logic, and reason. As a staff strategist, she pursues victory, but what she values even more is the safety of her allies. Despite the ruthless impression, she is a kind and caring person.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A rifle that Kikyou carries around with her at all times.

Being a strategist, she rarely actually uses it. However, Kikyou is willing to stand in danger's path for a perfect victory, and has been saved by this gun on many occasions.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Eimi is a member of the Supernatural Phenomenon Task Force at Millennium Science School.

It's hard to tell what she's thinking, but she seems to be a little more excited than usual since arriving to the bitterly cold region. Saying that, her fashion sense seems to be the same as usual.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Conventional design shotgun that is favored by Eimi.

As the name suggests, it can be used in many environments, even in extremely cold regions.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Veritas member that's dressed warmly for the chilly winter.

Although she didn't feel like going out, Kotama took it as a opportunity to record ambient sounds that would normally be difficult to acquire. She if fond of all the sounds that can be recorded in natural environments, but her favorite is definitely the Sensei's voice.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A pistol that Kotama always carries.

This model has a minimized firing sound, allowing one to carry out operations even in the quiet mountains without alerting wild animals.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Veritas member that's dressed warmly for the chilly winter.

Not only was Hare going out for the first time in a while, but she also ended up at a campsite with almost no signal, so she seems to be less excited than usual. Although she can generally tolerate the inconvenience of being outdoors, Hare seems entirely unwilling to give up energy drinks.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A bullpup style assault rifle used by Hare.

It has an ignition function that allows user to easily light campfires, and it is equipped with an automatic aiming device that would be extremely helpful should a wild beast appear. However, when a bear actually appeared, Hare panicked and never used the feature properly.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
The president of the Disciplinary committee of Gehenna changed into a dress to participate in the party.

She'd normally avoid going, but Hina heard that Sensei was looking forward to the Gehenna party, so she's a little more excited than usual. Since the day she decided to perform in front the audience, she has been working harder than usual to practice the piano, which she is not that good at.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Hina's machine gun that she utilizes as if it were one of her own limbs.

Normally, she is ruthless towards those who violate school rules or disrupt public morals, but this time, Hina treats them gently for the sake of someone else.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A student of Gehenna Academy, Ako is the executive officer of the Disciplinary Committee, and a sort-of secretary to its president Hina.

Ako ended up wearing a dress to assist Hina at the Gehenna party. She is respected by many members of the Disciplinary Committee for her highly professional work ethic, and Ako is confident that she will perform her duties perfectly as a secret agent as well...
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A pistol carried by Ako.

Proof of ability as an administrative official. Ako has always handled this gun with great care, and now it is always at her side for Gehenna's covert operations.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: A student from Gehenna Academy, member of the Pandemonium Society, and a mascot-like girl. She was originally a student of Gehenna Academy's elementary school, but Ibuki's ability was recognized and she joined Gehenna's "Pandemonium Society", which only the best students can enter. Being the youngest member of the Pandemonium Society, she is loved by everyone for her earnest cuteness. She is a well-behaved girl who works diligently so as not to cause trouble for her seniors.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A gun that Ibuki treasures.

Ibuki has attached her favorite stickers and accessories to the standard rifle she inherited from her senior at Pandemonium Society. It is one of Ibuki's most prized possessions.
DataList.FragmentSources: *Event: [[Sunshine Girls' Serenade]]

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: Chairman of the Gehenna Academy's Pandemonium Society. Makoto is an ambitious schemer who is willing to follow her desires and do anything to get what she wants. Although her attitude often causes Makoto to suffer and fail, she is a strong-willed girl who quickly recovers. She loves Ibuki like a younger sister, and also treats Iroha like one as well.
DataList.WeaponNameEn: I alone am the honored one
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A sniper rifle used by Makoto.

It is a genuine masterpiece, made by a renowned craftsman in Gehenna, that Makoto got to demonstrate her authority. However, Makoto herself prefers to give orders from the back rather than appear on the front, so she rarely actually uses it.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Section Chief of Problem Solver 68 and student of Gehenna Academy, currently infiltrating an Opera House.

Kayoko claims to be unaccustomed to wearing such clothes, but you wouldn't be able to tell it looking at her. She pays no attention to gazes of those around and just calmly goes about with her work.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A handgun that Kayoko usually carries.

It comes with a silencer, making it practical for secret infiltration missions.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: The president of Problem Solver 68 and a student of Gehenna Academy, who accepted the request for an infiltration mission. She doesn't get to show off in dresses often, but she wears them perfectly. Aru is absolutely thrilled to be offered such a hard-boiled job, but she tries to keep a straight face.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Aru never lets go of her sniper rifle, even on special missions.

Its beauty shines all the more in such refined surroundings.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Akari from Gehenna Academys' Gourmet Research Society changed into a kimono to welcome the new year.

She's smiling as usual, but she also seems a little flustered. Is she excited about the new year, or...
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Akari's favorite assault rifle.

If you stand between Akari and her food, you will first have to face this gun.

DataList.HobbyEn: Going to festivals, collecting festival-related goods (pamphlets)
DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: A first-year member of the festival management committee of Hyakkiyako Alliance Academy. Being from the countryside, Umika was always fascinated by the festivals held in cities. She has exhaustive knowledge of all the festivals held throughout Kivotos. Once Umika starts talking, she tends to gush about obscure festival topics; others often note that she's very attractive when silent.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Umika's usual assault rifle.

She claims that it is a perfect festival accessory for any occasion, whether it's announcing the start of a festival or solving minor problems that occur at a festival.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
President of the inner discipline club at Hyakkiyako Academy.

She is filling in the role of a guide to take students on school excursions, but never neglects her own sleep training. Sometimes she dozes off, sometimes she sharply cuts to the heart of the matter, and sometimes she manages to mix both in a casual manner.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Tsubaki's submachine gun.

This small gun, which does not interfere with the daily training routine, seems to be quite useful in her role as a guide.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A member of the After School Sweets Club at Trinity Integrated Academy, and  the singing bassist of the hastily formed band "Sugar Rush".
Due to a slip of the tongue, Kazusa ended up in charge of the vocals, and stubbornly avoided backing out of the role. By now Kazusa is used to all the noisy events that the group gets to, and she accepts her role in the band.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A machine gun that is carving out a new history together with Kazusa.

It is the closest witness of all her various adventures.

DataList.HobbyEn: All kinds of events, touring cafés for limited edition sweets
DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: A member of the After School Sweets Club at Trinity Integrated Academy, and the guitarist of the hastily formed "Sugar Rush." band. Yoshimi initially decided start the band by the spur the moment, but she is commited that "if it's worth doing, it's worth doing right". She is also in charge of the visual aspects of the band, such as their logo, visuals, and costumes.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
An assault rifle that Yoshimi always carries with her.

It is usually used to fight over sweets. The crisp pop of a gunshot echoes as much as the sound of Yoshimi's guitar.

DataList.HobbyEn: Looking for tasty sweets, tea parties
DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Enrolled at Trinity Integrated Academy, Airi is a member of the After School Sweets Club.

She has an easygoing personality and treasures spending time talking with her friends while eating sweets more than enything else.
She loves ice cream and has recently developed a taste for mint chocolate.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Airi's favorite submachine gun.

Its appearance reminds Airi of something she herself has been craving.
DataList.FragmentSources: *Event: [[-ive_aLIVE!]]

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Kirara is a high school girl with a bright personality from the Gehenna Academy.

She is always on lookout for novelty and excitement. Kirara is extremely sociable and can easily chat up people she'd just met for the first time.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A gun that Kirara always carries with her.

It's decorated to Kirara's taste, making it look more like a fashion statement than a firearm. The name is a refrence to Kirala's favorite crepe type.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Student of Millennium Science School, and the scenario writer for the Game Development Club.

By chance, they were mistaken for C&C and ended up wearing maid outfits. Momoi is caught up in an incident, but with her characteristic bright and dignified demeanor, she manages to overcome the adversity.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
An assault rifle used by Momoi.

She claims that she needs a gun to become a maid, but doesn't seem able to explain why.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
An illustrator of the Millennium Science School Game Development Club is disguised as a member of C&C...

Although Midori herself claims that she ended up wearing the maid outfit unwillingly, she seems to be taking the mission seriously.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Midori's sniper rifle.

She claims that gun is a necessary attribute for the perfect maid.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Student of Abydos High School, and the secretary of the Abydos Foreclosure Task Force, Serika is visiting a resort to enjoy her well-deserved vacation.

Undeterred by repeated failures, Serika tries to treat the vacation as seriously as her part-time job. Even though she appears to be overwhelmed at times, she enjoys spending time with the members of the committee.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Serika's assault rifle, which she carries without fail at the vacation resort.

Serika never fails to keep it in top condition in order to enjoy the most fulfilling vacation.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: The head of the Public Peace Bureau of the Valkyrie Police Academy, dispatched as a lifeguard. Although she has excellent swimming skills, danger perception, and situational awareness, Kanna seems to have a hard time dealing with citizens, perhaps due to her uniquely threatening appearance.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A standard handgun issued by the Valkyrie Police Academy.

It is waterproofed so it can be used in water.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A lazy student of the Public Safety Bureau of Valkyrie Police Academy who was dispatched as a lifeguard.

Fubuki accepted the assignment at the water park without much thought, thinking she could slack off. While at it, she also seems to be constantly devising ways to evade doing any work.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Standard model rifle provided to Fubuki by Valkyrie Police Academy.

The wielder herself seems to hope she will never need to use it.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
An enthusiastic student belonging to the Public Safety Bureau of Valkyrie Police Academy who was dispatched as a lifeguard.

Although her motivation is impeccable, her skills are not quite up to the task. However, Kirino is undeterred and is putting all effort into her lifeguard duties.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Standard model handgun issued to Kirino by Valkyrie Police Academy.

It seems that her sense of duty as a lifeguard has made her shooting skills better than usual?
DataList.FragmentSources:
*Event Supply Box:
**[[Say-Bing!]] (160+ × Shards)

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
An operator of the RABBIT platoon belonging to SRT Special Academy, visiting a fishing village for an infiltration operation.

She seems excited to to test her weapons in an unusual environment. Unlike the other platoon members, Moe is wearing a rather revealing swimsuit, which she claims is part of her doom.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A standard pistol that Moe received from SRT Special Academy.

Its sturdy molybdenum alloy frame allows for rapid fire even in the hot and humid seaside conditions.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A lazy young girl from Abydos High School, former vice president of the Abydos Student Council, and president of the Foreclosure Task Force.

Now equipped with armaments that she had kept in storage, Hoshino appears ready for combat. Not that different from the usual Hoshino, but now that she is armed, a glimpse of resolve can be seen in her eyes.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Hoshino's favorite shotgun of simple design.

It is the core of Hoshino's equipment.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A young, lazy girl from Abydos High School and president of the Foreclosure Task Force. Hoshino came to the uninhabited island in search of a relaxing summer.

Despite to her laid back attitude, she is surprisingly well prepared for the trip. However, she does not seem to be aware that she is a little more aggressive than usual.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A combination of Hoshino's favorite shotgun and a carefully stored handgun.

A secret weapon that she uses on the offensive, in a complete departure from her usual fighting style.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: Shiroko from another timeline who crossed over along with Prenapates. She is the same as Shiroko in this world, though a little more grown up. Shiroko deeply  cares for Abydos and will do whatever it takes to rebuild the school and the region, though sometimes she shows her eccentric side.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Shiroko's cherished assault rifle.

Although there are marks of repair, it is well-maintained and operates reliably.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: A member of the Arius Squad who came to play at the beach. This is her first time at the beach and at a festival, so Atsuko seems to be having a lot fun. She plans to capture memories of the beach with a digital camera she bought on the black market.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A submachine gun used by Atsuko.

It helps protect the squad's summer.
DataList.FragmentSources: *Event: [[Sheside outside]]

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: The leader of the Arius Squad, who continues to search for herself. Being somewhat naive, Saori sometimes does eccentric things, but she is sincere in the work she takes on.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Assault rifle used by Saori.

Even between the various part-time jobs, she carefully maintains it so that it can perform at its full potential.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: A member of the Arius Squad who came to play at the beach. Although she is having high expectations about the beach based on what she learned from a magazine, it seems that Hiyori is having a hard time enjoying it 100% due to her negative personality.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Hiyori's sniper rifle.

Although it is aimed at prizes instead of enemies, its accuracy remains the same.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Marina, chairman of the security committee at Red Winter Federal Academy, changed into a qipao for the exchange meeting with Shanhaijng.

She seemed to enjoy the exchange meeting a lot, being enchanted by the cute pandas and impressed by Shanhaijng's hospitality.
She is perplexed by the difference of this new costume comapred to Red Winter uniforms, but those around praised the qipao, saying that it suited her.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Marina's favorite submachine gun with a drum magazine.

No matter where they are or what she's wearing, it will mercilessly attack anyone who questions the authority of Red Winter.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Tomoe, secretary general at Red Winter Federal Academy, changed into a qipao for the exchange meeting with Shanhaijng.

Bewildered by the different environment from Red Winter, she still seemed to be enjoying the exchange meeting. She is also very enthusiastic about the new outfit.
Her public speaking skills and insight appear to be coming useful at this exchange meeting.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Tomoe's sniper rifle.

Tomoe herself claims that she would rather not use it at social gatherings, but that depends on the time and situation.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: A member of Shanhaijing Senior High School, Reijo is the manager of the main branch of the Genbu Trading Company, Rumi's assistant, and a security guard. She is quite a kung fu fanatic, and often tries to imitate phrases and actions of a certain famous martial artist. Contrary to her cool and detached appearance, she sometimes shows a fiery passion.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
The assault rifle used by Reijo.
Reijo has added some improvements to it in order to harmonize the gun and her fists. Her marksmanship... has improved somewhat as a result of constant training.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: Kisaki is the head of the Genryumon student council at Shanhaijing Senior High School. She has an old-fashioned and dignified way of speaking, combined with a somewhat mysterious demeanor, making her hard to approach. She actually leverages that image to her advantage. Kisaki has been known to occasionally go "incognito" into the streets, but those in position to know her true identity would still watch over her.
DataList.WeaponNameEn: Know the Enemy and Know Yourself
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Kisaki's favorite submachine gun.
She believes that everything starts with knowing your opponent and yourself.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: A member of the Trinity Integrated Academy, Mari is a sister of the Sisterhood and the leader of the idol group "Antique Seraphim." She started out by helping people out, but before she knew it, Mari was standing on stage as a splendid idol. Mari's desire to "make everyone happy" may be a great fit for an idol role.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Mari's pistol, which she always keeps close even when she's in an idol costume.

The design is chic, so it matches Mari's outfit perfectly.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: Sakurako is a sister of the Sisterhood at Trinity Integrated Academy and a member of the idol group "Antique Seraphim". To clear up the prejudice and misunderstandings about the Sisterhood, she applied to take part in an idol event. Although Sakurako was initially worried that she wasn't cut out for it, she was well received within the Sisterhood and found a passionate fanbase.
DataList.WeaponDescEn: No matter what outfit she changes into, the gun by her side remains the same, just like Sakurako's devotion.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: Mine is a member of the idol group "Antique Seraphim" and a leader of the Rescue Knights, belonging to Trinity Integrated Academy. She volunteered to take part in an idol event because she wanted to be a "friendly Rescue Knights commander". Even after changing into her idol outfit, Mine's serious and stubborn personality remains unchanged, but she seems to have become a little more open about her love of cute things.
DataList.WeaponDescEn: Mine's favorite shotgun. Just as her idol activities are an extension of her work as a member of the Rescue Knights, this gun may as well be an idol accessory.
DataList.FragmentSources:
* Event Missions, Milestone Rewards, and Shop:
** [[Serenade Promenade]]

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: Satsuki is a council member of Gehenna Academy's "Pandemonium Society", and the head of its intelligence department. Although she has mastered various hypnotism techniques, there have only been precious few cases where Satsuki managed to succefully apply them. She is a tough girl who doesn't get discouraged even after repeated failures. She has a laid-back personality and does things at her own pace. Hates bugs and scary things.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Satsuki's favorite pistol.

She doesn't like pain, so contrary to the grandiose name, it is designed to be convenient to carry, and is not particularly powerful.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: Chiaki is a member of Gehenna Academy's "Pandemonium Society" council and its secretary. A girl with a bright and cheerful personality. She publishes the "Pandemonium Society Weekly" newspaper as a hobby. Chiaki constantly writes articles in an effort spread the word about Ibuki's cuteness to as many students as possible.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Chiaki's personal rifle.

The flash suppressor has been modified to provide an extra bright muzzle flash.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: Seminar's treasurer at Millennium Science School changed into her pajamas to get some rest. Although Yuuka performs her job perfectly every day, she can't say she's getting a good night's sleep due to the stress and insomnia caused by the constant troubles. She prepared a fluffy pillow and soft pajamas... but it seems that a good night's sleep in not on the agenda for a while because someone is raising trouble at Millennium day and night.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A pair of submachine guns used by Yuuka.

The two guns have always represented her rationality and reason, but neither seems to help her insomnia.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Member of the Millennium Science School and secretary of the "Seminar" student council, Noa has changed into pajamas to enjoy some peaceful rest.

The secretary's days off are usually quiet, as she doesn't mingle much with others, but the moments she spends with the seminar members are an exception. Noa just silently watches the scene as her cute junior and affectionate classmate misunderstand and cause a commotion. With a light smile she jots down a few notes.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Pistol with a conversion kit used by Noa.

When the stock is retracted, it's the perfect size for a paperweight. She uses it as a handy companion for bedtime reading.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: A member of Trinity Integrated Academy, Seia is the leader of the "Sanctus" student union, one of the Trinity factions. She is pedantic and difficult to please. Being a bookworm, Seia is often found in the Great Library. After recovering from her injuries, she sometimes shows her more childish side.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Seia's favorite pistol.

Its design exudes elegance befitting a Tea Party member. Just like its sharp-tongued owner, it is always ready to retaliate.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
An agent of Millennium Science School's secret society "C&C" who will be a guide for the Millennium EXPO.

Although she's changed into a school uniform to serve as a guide, she also fills in as a bodyguard. This, combined with her natural cheerfulness, makes Asuna very popular.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
The assault rifle used by Asuna.

As usual, its name perfectly reflects her temperament.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: An agent of Millennium Science School's secret society "C&C", who will be serving as a guide for the Millennium EXPO. She has changed into her school uniform to serve as both a guide for the venue and a guard for important guests. Due to the nature of her club activities, Karin usually wears a maid outfit, so she can't hide her excitement at this rare opportunity. She is calm and friendly, so she seems to be trustworthy as a guide.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Karin's special anti-materiel sniper rifle.

No matter what the target is, it can be shot down with unparalleled accuracy.
DataList.FragmentSources: *Event: [[Code: BOX Shadow Looming Over Millennium ～One Question and Two Answers～]]

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: President of the "Seminar" student council at the Millennium Science School. Rio is a rationalist, she will do anything to ensure the safety of the Millennium and the world. As a result, she is known as the "Big Sister". She has a peculiar sense of style, as can be seen in "Avant-Guard-kun".
DataList.WeaponDescEn: Rio's self-defense handgun. Although she is not a good marksman, Rio owns one because she believes it would be illogical to not have a gun in Kivotos.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
The leader of "C&C", and a member of the Millennium Science School, Neru has been tasked with being a guide for the Millennium EXPO.

Normally she would have refused, but this time Neru was talked into taking over guard and guiding duties. She also seems to be carrying out secret missions behind the scenes...?
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Neru's dual submachine guns.

Even if her outfit changes, sparks flying from the muzzle remain the same.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
The member of Veritas changed into warm clothes to suit the cold winter weather.

 Although she was not enthusiastic about the sudden mountain trek, Maki seems to have enjoyed it to some extent, having been inspired by the new scenery. She remains disappointed about not being able to post about the experiences on the Internet.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A multi-purpose machine gun that Maki often uses when drawing graffiti.

It's a little heavy to lug along on camping trips or mountain hikes, but the burning artistic spirit will get you anywhere.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Head of the Emergency Medicine Department within Gehenna Academy has changed into her casual clothes to enjoy the day off.

Even off duty, Sena does not forget her duties as head of the Emergency Medicine Department. However, deep down, she seems to be waiting for "something" to happen and make it a fun day off. Because of this, she seems to be more inquisitive than usual.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Short-barrel grenade launcher used by Sena.

Even on holidays, its function remains unchanged.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: Student of Gehenna Academy School Lunch Club has changed into the uniform of their part-time jobs. Just when Juri thought she would finally be able to complete a normal dish... it turns out to be as it always does. Still, she never forgets the joy of her rare moments of success, and continues to practice her cooking daily.
DataList.WeaponNameEn: School Lunch Club self-defense gun type B
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Juri's usual shotgun.

It is apparently an essential piece of equipment even during part-time jobs.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
The member of the Gehenna Academy's Gourmet Research Society, dressed in her finest attire to welcome the New Year.

No matter the festive outfit, Izumi's exploration of food continues unabated. That is her driving force and her identity.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A heavy machine gun used by Izumi.

In pursuit of new culinary horizons, she continues to blaze the way with her beloved gun.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
Sumire is the leader of the Training Club at Millennium Science School.

Due to a certain incident, Sumire ended up working part-time as a vendor at a baseball stadium. She doesn't mind the weight of her outsfit since it doubles as training.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Sumire's prized shotgun that she uses while exercising.

It seems to be effective for both weight training and part-time work.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: Rei is a member of the Millennium Science School and is the No. 4 batter who loves baseball. She is determined to reform the Millennium Baseball Club, which is currently resigned to studying physics and ball dynamics. She seems to get along well with the fitness nut Sumire... except when it comes to actual competition.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Ray's recoilless rifle, filled with her desire for a home run.

"Someday, I'll hit a moonshot!", she boasts.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: The leader of the Arius Squad, of the Arius Branch School, Saori had to change into a dress for work. She seems to enjoy wearing it greatly. Saori is yet unaware that her desire for fashion is unconsciously manifesting itself.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Assault rifle used by Saori.

The outfit may be different, but her trusty gun remains the same.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A student at the Highlander Railway Academy and an officer of the CCC (Central Control Center).

She has outstanding talent for driving trains, and was chosen as an officer along with her younger twin sister Nozomi. However, Hikari is terrible at paperwork and administrative tasks. She follows her whims and does things at her own pace without worrying about what others think, which causes all kinds of incidents.
DataList.WeaponDescEn: Hikari's favorite handgun. It's extremely effective against unruly and "annoying" passengers. She seems to be keeping it well-maintained.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A student at the Highlander Railway Academy and an officer of the CCC (Central Control Center).

She has a cheerful and lively personality and doesn't worry about small details. Perhaps because of this, Nozomi often gets into trouble with her older twin sister Hikari. Although she's the type to jump right into anything that looks interesting, she is very diligent when it comes to her responsibility for train operations.
DataList.WeaponDescEn: Nozomi's favorite handgun. Although she doesn't use it often, Nozomi takes great care of it so that she can always eliminate any elements that would interfere with the train's operation.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: An engineer in the Freight Logistics Department at Highlander Railway Academy. Although she is shy and easily scared, Aoba also has a side to her that casually makes piercing sarcastic remarks. Perhaps because she speaks in a hushed voice, it can be a little difficult to tell whether the words she speaks are insulting or not. She is always busy with hard work and often feels unfairly treated, and harbors a strong dissatisfaction with the world.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Aoba's favorite shotgun.

The paradoxical name reflects her philosophy of "not expecting anything." It's a perfect weapon to blow away anything that bothers you...
DataList.FragmentSources: * Event: [[Highlander Railroad Runaway Incident 〜 And Then The Train Was Gone 〜]]

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: A student at Hyakkiyako Alliance Academy, Pina has taken on the role of a guide for the school trip. Even after becoming a guide, she has not lost her bubbly attitude. Rather, she makes the most of that personality and is more enthusiastic about her work as a guide than anyone else. However, someone should probably keep an eye on her to make sure Pina does not confuse her would-be vigilante ambitions with the school trip...
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A machine gun owned by Pina.

Pours fire to match the passion burning in Pina's heart.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: A student of the Hyakkiyako Academy and a member of the Hyakkaryouran Conflict Resolution Council. Originally the vice president of Hyakkaryouran, Nagusa inherited the leadership position after the previous president, Ayame, disappeared. Nagusa is timid, has low self-esteem, and is indecisive, but she has shown the strength of character to overcome fears and move forward for the sake of those she cares about.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
An old rifle that gives off a mysterious aura.

This weapon has been passed down from generation to generation since the great prophet Kuzunoha, and wielding it is  proof of being the rightful successor of Hyakkaryouran. Countless scratches and repair marks tell the story of hopes and aspirations woven into its history.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: President of Yin-Yang Club at the Hyakkiyako Academy. Outsiders may know Niya as the Student Council President, but she is better known as the Non-Working President as due to the structure of Hyakkiyako Academy she is usually tied in much more complicated matters… or so she claims; the dislike of work is her second nature. Niya always seems to casually cause havoc, but behind it all, there may be an ulterior motive that she does not reveal to others.
DataList.WeaponDescEn: The gun Niya always carries with her. However, it seems that almost no one has ever witnessed her fire it.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A member of the After School Sweets Club at Trinity General School, Natsu is the drummer and schedule manager for the hastily formed band "Sugar Rush".

She seems to have deep insight into the spirit of "rock", though she refuses to explain it properly. Natsu says that explaining it wouldn't be rock.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Natsu's submachine gun. 

It's the "last resort" for problems that can't be solved through contemplation alone. Modern world is a complex place, sometimes you need to go beyond peaceful measures.

DataList.HobbyEn: Cat's cradle, reading military books, sunbathing
DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: Summer has come and Kikyou is now in her swimsuit as the Strategy Officer for the Hyakkaryouran Dispute Mediation Committee, a member of the Hyakkiyako Academy. Although she's open to showing a previously-unseen side of personality, Kikyou still keeps her inability to swim a secret. She ends up participating in the Momoyo Water Festival, being swept up in the atmosphere.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A rifle that Kikyou carries around with her at all times.

Even in a naval battle where she is considered to be at a disadvantage, Kikyou is fully prepared to seize a perfect victory.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: Summer has come and Renge, the head of Hyakkaryouran Dispute Mediation Committee of the Hyakkiyako Academy, is now in her swimsuit. She will be participating in the Momoyo Water Festival to enjoy the youthful summer with everyone. No one can stop her burning fighting spirit and fiery passion.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Renge's favorite rifle.

With reliable teammates, winning is not just a dream.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: Summer has come and Yukari, a first-year student at the  Hyakkiyako Alliance Academy and the Hyakkaryouran Dispute Mediation Committee, has changed into a swimsuit. She is especially excited hearing that she can participate in the Momoyo Water Festival with her favorite senior. Her characteristically bright and outgoing personality is still evident even at sea.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
A Hyakkaryouran standard rifle used by Yukari.

It is an irreplaceable treasure, so it's been carefully waterproofed to prevent it from getting wet.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: A member of Trinity Integrated Academy, currently enjoying a leisurely summer vacation, Seia is the leader of the "Sanctus" student union, one of the Trinity factions. She has switched to vacation mode and is all set to enjoy the summer. Although she has always been a laid-back person, it seems that an even more free-spirited side is now showing through.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Seia's favorite pistol.

She's wearing less clothing, but her unique way of speaking and her firepower were not stripped away. She makes use of this gun just as boldly as of her new outfit.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
The vice-chair of the Justice Actualization Committee, a member of Trinity Integrated Academy, Hasumi came to the beach as an escort for the Tea Party.

Hasumi strictly separates her public and private affairs, so although she doesn't show it, she is truly happy to be at the beach. She may be the one enjoying this vacation the most. Thanks to her meticulous self-control, she doesn't have to worry about wearing a swimsuit... in theory.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Hasumi's favorite sniper rifle.

The always shining barrel reflects her determination to never let her guard down, no matter the situation.

DataList.HobbyEn: Helping people, trying her hand at various jobs
DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A member of the Justice Actualization Committee of Trinity Integrated Academy, Ichika strives to maintain her calm demeanor even at sea.

Although Ichika is known to be an always kind and easygoing exemplary member of the Justice Actualization Committee, her patience is being tested by the reunion with her worst nemesis. Ichika is not conscious of it, but her face betrays more emotions than usual.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Ichika's assault rifle has been with her through all sorts of hardships.

Despite its carefully maintained appearance, traces of rough use remain here and there.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
As a member of the Tea Party, Mika was the one who took the lead in planning a beach vacation.

It started out as a way to be considerate towards her friends, but somehow things just keep getting progressively more complicated. These days, she seems to have a lot of sleepless nights due to multitude of worries piling up.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Mika's favorite submachine gun.

It's been carefully cared for, and it shines like a star even at the beach.

DataList.HobbyEn: Collecting tea leaves, making sweets, tending the garden
DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A member of Trinity General Academy, Nagisa is the leader of "Filius", one of the student union bodies that make up Trinity, and the host of the "Tea Party" student council.

Since she was dragged out to the beach practically against her will, Nagisa remains worried about the work she left behind. However, deep down, she doesn't seem to mind the situation.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Nagisa's favorite pistol.

Even in the sea breeze, sand and scorching heat, it never loses its elegance.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: A member of the Wildhunt Art Academy and the president of the Occult Research Society, which explores the occult that resides in art. Eri wears a large hat and talks of everything in magical terms. She strongly believes that the power of the occult can improve her grades and artistic ability.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
The rifle that Eri claims is a magic wand.

It may be similar in the sense that sparks fly from the tip.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A member of the Occult Research Society at Wildhunt Art Academy, Kanoe explores the occult that resides in art.

Despite being the only third-year student in the Occult Research Society, she is not the president, opting instead to back other members. Rumors circulate that she herself may be an occult being due to her suspicious appearance and behavior.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Kanoe's usual shotgun.

Rather than using gunpowder, it fires bullets through an alchemical reaction... apparently.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: Misaki is a student of Arius Branch School and a member of the Arius Squad. She has a cold, detached look, yet her eyes betray an unconcealed excitement about being at the ocean for the first time. If you point this out to her, she will blush and become embarassed.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Rocket launcher used by Misaki.

Now that summer is here, it might be a good idea to find another use for it.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: Miyako is the leader of RABBIT platoon belonging to SRT Special Academy. She enrolled in the SRT Special Academy admiring the success of her seniors, only to find her school suddenly closed. She is now living in the park with fellow platoon members. Her facial expressions do not change much and she rarely shows her emotions, so people around Miyako tend to think that she is unsociable. However, deep down inside, she is always concerned about the members of her platoon and has a kind heart. Her callsign is "RABBIT1".
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
The rifle Miyo always carries with her, but rarely uses due to her personality.

At best, it serves as a tool for punctuating the area with bullet holes.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: A member of the Wildhunt Art Academy, Fuyu is the sales and technical specialist for unofficial smuggling group, Free Trade Cartel. She serves as the liaison for the Free Trade Cartel, handling requests and negotiating directly with clients. Fuyu seems confident and composed, but facing unexpected situations can leave her shaken and unsure of herself.
DataList.WeaponDescEn: Fuyu's suspicious machine pistol of unknown make. Flasing this to customers tends to make them accept Fuyu's proposal.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A member of the Wildhunt Art Academy, she is the muscle at the unofficial smuggling group, Free Trade Cartel.

Ritsu founded the current Free Trade Cartel, and makes use of her superhuman strength to do the heavy lifting for the club. Optimistic and pure-hearted, she genuinely enjoys the club's activities.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
The submachine gun that Ritsu always carries.

Often employed to blast holes in stone by pulling the trigger.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
A student of Trinity General School who has donned a magical girl costume to carry out an undercover mission for Vigilante Corps.

Reisa appears very excited, perhaps because she has loved magical girl stories since childhood.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Reisa's prized shotgun.

She claims it's a magic wand because it has sound, lights, and firepower.

DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn: A student of Trinity General School who had to wear a magical girl costume on an undercover mission for Vigilante Corps. Suzumi knows little about magical girl stories and doesn't fully understand the costume's significance. Though uncomfortable in the spotlight, she resolves to carry on her usual earnestness.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Suzumi's assault rifle.

Lavishly decorated for undercover missions, it remains a precious partner for Suzumi.

DataList.HobbyEn: Polishing helmets, rummaging under vending machines
DataList.ProfileIntroductionEn:
The captain of the Splash Helmet Gang.

She is trusted by her subordinates and has a big sister personality. However, she doesn't seem to have much luck.
DataList.WeaponDescEn:
Rabu's shotgun.

Although often used as a bat, it's kept well-maintained.
